programme.title: Kite
programme.desc: A teenager living in a corrupt society dominated by violent street gangs swears revenge when her parents are murdered. Joining forces with her father's former partner on the police force, she journeys into the depths of the criminal underworld to learn the killers' identities. Crime thriller, starring India Eisley and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: The Survivalist
programme.desc: A loner survives the downfall of civilisation, living in a remote cabin on a small plot of land. When two women discover his refuge, he grudgingly allows them food and shelter, but they struggle to trust one another, especially as the supplies begin to run out. Thriller, starring Martin McCann and Mia Goth.

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Resurrection F
programme.desc: When evil overlord Frieza is resurrected and plans to take revenge on the Z-Fighters, only Goku and Vegeta can stop him. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Sean Schemmel, Christopher R Sabat and Christopher Ayres.

programme.title: Suicide Squad: Special
programme.desc: The making of the DC movie about a group of super-villains thrown together on a mission to save the world, including behind-the-scenes footage and cast interviews.

programme.title: Kite
programme.desc: A teenager living in a corrupt society dominated by violent street gangs swears revenge when her parents are murdered. Joining forces with her father's former partner on the police force, she journeys into the depths of the criminal underworld to learn the killers' identities. Crime thriller, starring India Eisley and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: The Dressmaker
programme.desc: An Australian fashion designer returns to her remote home town in the 1950s after forging a successful career in Paris. She reconciles with her mother, falls in love and transforms the lives of the local women - getting even with her enemies in the process. Drama based on the novel by Rosalie Ham, starring Kate Winslet, Judy Davis, Hugo Weaving and Liam Hemsworth.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Resurrection F
programme.desc: When evil overlord Frieza is resurrected and plans to take revenge on the Z-Fighters, only Goku and Vegeta can stop him. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Sean Schemmel, Christopher R Sabat and Christopher Ayres.

programme.title: Time Out of Mind
programme.desc: A man finds himself living on the streets as his health deteriorates, leaving him with nowhere to turn. He tries to find a place in a shelter where he befriends another homeless man, who supports and advises him in an attempt to put his life back in order and reconcile with his estranged daughter. Drama, starring Richard Gere, Ben Vereen, Jena Malone and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last 300 days. Ridley Scott's sci-fi comedy drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Resurrection F

programme.title: The Rendlesham UFO Incident
programme.desc: Three treasure hunters searching for Saxon gold unearth more than they bargained for when they sneak into Suffolk's notorious Rendlesham Woods three decades after a UFO incident. Sci-fi thriller, starring Robert Curtis, Abbie Salt and Danny Shayler.(n)

programme.title: Finding Pixar
programme.desc: Alex Zane heads to Pixar's San Francisco headquarters to go behind-the-scenes on the making of Finding Dory, and investigate the secret of the studio's remarkable success.(n)

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Resurrection F
programme.desc: When evil overlord Frieza is resurrected and plans to take revenge on the Z-Fighters, only Goku and Vegeta can stop him. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Sean Schemmel, Christopher R Sabat and Christopher Ayres.(n)

programme.title: Spud
programme.desc: A teenager tries to fit in during his first year at an elite South African boarding school in 1990, and faces romantic problems while working on a production of Oliver Twist. Comedy-drama, starring Troye Sivan, John Cleese and Jamie Royal.(n)

programme.title: The Dressmaker

programme.title: Tokyo Tribe
programme.desc: Premiere. In an alternative, dystopian Tokyo, rival street gangs must join forces to defeat their common enemy, a cannibalistic gangster. Japanese sci-fi drama based on a popular Manga series, starring Ryohei Suzuki, Riki Takeuchi and Akihiro Kitamura.(n)

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: A Brooklyn bartender secretly provides a service delivering shipments of money to local gangsters. His criminal connections lead to his involvement in a robbery that goes disastrously wrong and digs up the long-buried secrets from his neighbourhood's past. Crime drama based on a short story by Dennis Lehane, starring Tom Hardy, Noomi Rapace and James Gandolfini in his final film role.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service Special
programme.desc: Alex Zane goes behind the scenes on the action comedy, which stars Colin Firth as a secret agent training a young protege.

programme.title: The Book of Life
programme.desc: A man who longs to be a musician instead of a bullfighter like his father has to compete with a childhood friend when they fall for the same woman. Their love triangle catches the eye of the spirits of the dead, leading him on a journey through their bizarre world. Animated adventure, with the voices of Diego Luna, Zoe Saldana and Channing Tatum.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Aliens declare war on Earth having seen video games from the 1980s and interpreted them as a threat. Their attack comes in the form of deadly recreations of classic video games, so the US government recruits four former arcade champions to repel the attack. Sci-fi comedy, starring Adam Sandler and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service Special
programme.desc: Alex Zane goes behind the scenes on the action comedy, which stars Colin Firth as a secret agent training a young protege.

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: A recently divorced bookshop owner finds love with a glamorous Hollywood film star, but ends up the focus of unwanted media interest - which makes maintaining a relationship a tricky proposition. Romantic comedy written by Richard Curtis, starring Hugh Grant, Julia Roberts, Rhys Ifans, Emma Chambers, James Dreyfus and Gina McKee.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Superman's home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle.

Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle.(n)

programme.title: Superman Returns

Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Superman's home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey.(n)

programme.title: The Boxtrolls
programme.desc: The people of a small town live in fear of underground trolls, which they do not realise are actually harmless. A boy raised by the creatures must convince the townsfolk there is nothing to fear when a team of pest exterminators is hired to wipe out the friendly monsters. Stop-motion animated fantasy, with the voices of Isaac Hempstead Wright, Elle Fanning and Ben Kingsley.(n)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: A Romanian knight fights to defend his homeland against Turkish invaders. Faced with overwhelming odds, he enters into a dangerous bargain to gain supernatural powers so he can drive off his enemies - but the deal could cost him his humanity as he transforms into a terrifying monster. Fantasy adventure, starring Luke Evans, Dominic Cooper and Charles Dance.(n)

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Heroic flightless birds Skipper, Kowalski, Private and Rico uncover a plot to take over the world. Needing help to foil the evil scheme, they seek out a secret society of animal agents, led by a heroic wolf. Animated comedy spin-off, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, John Malkovich and Tom McGrath.(n)

programme.title: The Bad Education Movie
programme.desc: Incompetent teacher Alfie Wickers decides his students deserve a treat for somehow passing their GCSEs, so decides to take them on the greatest school trip of their lives - to Cornwall. However, a series of disasters leaves the class into trouble with suspicious locals. Comedy, starring Jack Whitehall, Harry Enfield and Iain Glen.(n)

programme.title: Into the Woods
programme.desc: A wicked witch agrees to lift a curse on a young couple if they will help restore her once beautiful looks. Based on Stephen Sondheim's hit stage musical, the plot also entwines the fairy tale stories of Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood, Jack and the Beanstalk and Rapunzel. Musical fantasy, starring Meryl Streep, Johnny Depp, James Corden and Emily Blunt.(n)

programme.title: Suffragette
programme.desc: A woman joins a campaign to gain the right to vote in 1912. She and her allies find their peaceful protests accomplishing little in the face of an unwavering state, so resort to increasingly violent measures, risking everything they have in the pursuit of political justice. Period drama, starring Carey Mulligan, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne-Marie Duff and Meryl Streep.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.(n)

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Heroic flightless birds Skipper, Kowalski, Private and Rico uncover a plot to take over the world. Needing help to foil the evil scheme, they seek out a secret society of animal agents, led by a heroic wolf. Animated comedy spin-off, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, John Malkovich and Tom McGrath.(n)

Period drama, starring Carey Mulligan, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne-Marie Duff and Meryl Streep.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.(n)

programme.title: Monty Python's The Meaning of Life
programme.desc: A series of sketches examining mankind's secrets and taboos through the trials of life from conception to death. Surreal comedy, starring the Python team of Michael Palin, Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle, Terry Jones and Terry Gilliam. Featuring introductory short film The Crimson Permanent Assurance.

programme.title: Just Before I Go
programme.desc: After his wife leaves him, a troubled man plans to kill himself. Before doing so, he travels back to his hometown to settle some old scores and make amends with his friends and loved ones. While there, he begins to realise that perhaps life is worth living after all. Comedy drama, directed by Courteney Cox and starring Seann William Scott, Olivia Thirlby and Garret Dillahunt.

programme.title: The Grass Is Greener
programme.desc: An English earl is forced to open his stately home to the public to avoid going broke. When one of the tourists, an American tycoon, takes an interest in his wife, the peer enlists the aid of an old flame to save his marriage. Romantic comedy, starring Cary Grant, Deborah Kerr, Robert Mitchum and Jean Simmons.

programme.title: Vijay and I
programme.desc: A series of coincidences leads to fading actor Will being declared dead. Curious to find out what people really think of him, he decides to maintain the illusion of his demise and attend his own funeral, with the help of his best friend Rad, an Indian restaurant-owner. Transformed into a handsome and elegant Sikh, complete with turban and beard, Will takes on the persona of an old friend, Vijay, to attend the funeral, where he discovers some embarrassing truths about himself. Comedy, starring Moritz Bleibtreu, Patricia Arquette and Danny Pudi.

programme.title: Mr Woodcock
programme.desc: The successful author of a self-help book has managed to put the painful memories of being bullied by his PE teacher as a chubby youngster behind him. However, when he returns to his home town to accept a prestigious award, the writer is horrified to discover his mother is planning to marry his childhood tormentor. Comedy, starring Billy Bob Thornton, Seann William Scott and Susan Sarandon.

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: A romantic novelist goes in search of her kidnapped sister in the steamy jungles of South America, only to become the target of a villainous general who demands as a ransom the valuable treasure map in her possession. Help is at hand in the form of a craggy daredevil fortune hunter, who has his eye on a share of the profits. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner and Danny DeVito.

programme.title: The Jewel of the Nile
programme.desc: A novelist travels to the Middle East to become a sheik's official biographer, only to end up being held hostage by him. Her lover joins forces with an old enemy to rescue her, but they get drawn into the hunt for a mysterious ancient treasure that has a connection to an eccentric holy man. Comedy adventure sequel to Romancing the Stone, starring Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner and Danny DeVito.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancee's latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller.

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: A professional relationship guru, who specialises in offering advice to lonely single men, helps an unlucky-in-love accountant to woo the girl of his dreams. However, when he finds himself falling for a beautiful gossip columnist, his usual charm abandons him and he discovers his expertise counts for nothing. Romantic comedy, with Will Smith, Eva Mendes, Kevin James, Amber Valletta, Julie Ann Emery, Adam Arkin and Michael Rapaport.

programme.title: Search Party
programme.desc: Distraught over the realization that they scared away their best friend's fiancee, two hard-partying pals set out on a wild journey to reunite the estranged couple by any means necessary. Comedy, starring Adam Pally, TJ Miller and Thomas Middleditch.

programme.title: Unfinished Business
programme.desc: A small business owner and his two associates travel to Germany to seal an important deal, but a series of events conspire to make their trip a disaster - but it's coming face to face with a vicious former boss that really turns it into a nightmare. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Tom Wilkinson and Dave Franco.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Two party-mad bachelors make the most of the romantic atmosphere as they gatecrash weddings to pick up women. With a catalogue of tall stories to tell guests, the pair are regularly the hit of the events they attend - until one of them falls for a bridesmaid and they both learn a few things about love. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Vince Vaughn, Christopher Walken, Jane Seymour, Rachel McAdams and Isla Fisher.

programme.title: Think Like a Man Too
programme.desc: A couple announce they are getting married in Las Vegas, so all their friends descend on the gambling capital. However, the build-up to the big day descends into a bitter rivalry between the male and female guests over who can throw the wildest pre-marital party - despite the efforts of the groom's overbearing mother to disrupt the celebrations. Comedy sequel, starring Kevin Hart and Regina Hall.

programme.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
programme.desc: A petty thief poses as an actor to avoid the law, and lands a role playing a detective. The crook is sent to work with a real-life private eye to perfect his performance, but the unlikely duo end up in over their heads when they stumble on a series of murders. Comedy thriller, starring Robert Downey Jr, Val Kilmer and Michelle Monaghan.(n)

programme.title: Superfast
programme.desc: A cop is sent on an undercover assignment to infiltrate a gang of illegal street racers. He gets drawn into the group's ludicrous plot to double-cross a crime kingpin and steal the restaurant where he hides his ill-gotten gains. Spoof of the Fast & Furious movies, starring Alex Ashbaugh and Dale Pavinski.(n)

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: The world's most inept police detective, Inspector Clouseau, heads off to Switzerland in search of a suave jewel thief who has purloined a priceless diamond from a princess - but the bumbling officer's every ruse to foil the crime ends in chaos, not least when he is framed for the robbery himself. Blake Edwards' comedy, starring Peter Sellers, David Niven, Capucine, Robert Wagner and Claudia Cardinale.(n)

programme.title: King Ralph
programme.desc: A slobbish Las Vegas lounge singer succeeds the British throne when a freak accident wipes out the entire royal family. A loyal aristocrat desperately tries to stop the loud-mouthed American unwittingly bringing the monarchy into disrepute, while a scheming lord plots to make his reign a short one. Comedy, starring John Goodman, Peter O'Toole, John Hurt and Richard Griffiths.(n)

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally
programme.desc: A man and a woman with different attitudes to life meet by chance and develop a close and long-lasting friendship. But over time, a mutual sexual attraction begins to develop and threatens to ruin their relationship - raising the question whether men and women can ever really be just friends. Romantic comedy, starring Billy Crystal and Meg Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Rushmore
programme.desc: A student causes chaos in an exclusive private school with his temperamental nature - and things go from bad to worse when he develops a crush on a teacher. A wealthy but miserable businessman strikes up a friendship with the troubled teenager, but when he also falls for the same woman, all-out war is declared. Wes Anderson's comedy drama, starring Jason Schwartzman, Bill Murray, Olivia Williams and Brian Cox.(n)

programme.title: Three Amigos
programme.desc: Three silent Western movie stars are summoned to Mexico for what they think will be a public appearance - only to discover the locals really believe in their heroic abilities and expect them to rid their town of a group of evil bandits. Comedy, starring Steve Martin, Chevy Chase and Martin Short.(n)

programme.title: Spy - Extended Version
programme.desc: A deskbound CIA agent provides valuable background support for a dashing secret agent, but has never gone into action herself. Everything changes, when the spy mysteriously vanishes, and she leaps into action to take his place, infiltrating the inner circle of a ruthless arms dealer and trying to avert a global catastrophe. Comedy adventure, starring Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who S*****d Me
programme.desc: The sex-mad spy is sent back to swinging London at the height of the 1960s in pursuit of the dastardly Dr Evil, who has stolen the secret agent's `mojo'. Teaming up with a female American agent, Austin must stop his arch-rival from causing havoc with a doomsday weapon on the moon. Comedy sequel, starring Mike Myers in multiple roles alongside Heather Graham, Rob Lowe, Robert Wagner, Michael York, Seth Green and Verne Troyer.(n)

programme.title: St Vincent
programme.desc: A lonely 12-year-old boy gets locked out of his house, so turns to his next-door neighbour, a misanthropic Vietnam veteran with a gambling addiction. The neighbour takes a shine to the youngster, and offers his services as a babysitter, providing valuable life lessons and an introduction to the joys of gambling, fighting and petty theft. Comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Jaeden Lieberher, Melissa McCarthy and Naomi Watts.(n)

programme.title: Spy - Extended Version
programme.desc: A deskbound CIA agent provides valuable background support for a dashing secret agent, but has never gone into action herself. Everything changes, when the spy mysteriously vanishes, and she leaps into action to take his place, infiltrating the inner circle of a ruthless arms dealer and trying to avert a global catastrophe. Comedy adventure, starring Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: Bad Words
programme.desc: Jason Bateman directs and stars in this dark comedy about a 40-year-old misanthrope who enters children's spelling contests. With Kathryn Hahn, Rohan Chand and Philip Baker Hall.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners 2
programme.desc: Awkward teenagers Will, Simon and Neil find university life does not live up to their expectations, and are insanely jealous of Jay's stories of his gap year in Australia. Heading Down Under to meet their friend, they inevitably discover he has exaggerated his escapades - so decide to go in search of a real adventure. Comedy sequel, starring Simon Bird, James Buckley, Joe Thomas and Blake Harrison.(n)

programme.title: Unbroken
programme.desc: An Olympic athlete enlists in the US Air Force during the Second World War. When his plane is shot down, he and two crewmates survive for 33 days lost at sea. Worse is to come when they are captured by Japanese forces, and he endures brutal treatment in a PoW camp run by an infamous war criminal. Fact-based Second World War drama, directed by Angelina Jolie and starring Jack O'Connell and Domhnall Gleeson.

programme.title: Into the Grizzly Maze
programme.desc: A wild grizzly bear goes on the rampage in a remote Alaskan town. A sheriff ventures into the creature's territory to find his missing wife, enlisting the aid of his ex-convict brother. However, they soon find themselves stalked by the beast, while a famous bear hunter causes further problems. Thriller, starring Thomas Jane, James Marsden, Piper Perabo and Billy Bob Thornton.

programme.title: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
programme.desc: A swashbuckling sailor stumbles across a golden tablet that forms part of a map revealing the way to a magic fountain, which is fabled to bestow untold riches and eternal youth. But first the brave mariner has to battle storms, monsters and the trickery of an evil wizard before he can reach his goal. Fantasy adventure, with John Phillip Law, Tom Baker, Douglas Wilmer, Martin Shaw and Caroline Munro, with effects by Ray Harryhausen.

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: A courier is kidnapped and forced to become a drug mule. When she is exposed to the experimental chemicals she is smuggling, it boosts her intelligence and reflexes to superhuman levels. She uses her newfound abilities to get revenge on her captors, but as the process continues, she evolves into something more than human. Sci-fi thriller, starring Scarlett Johansson and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: James Bond goes rogue after receiving a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a secretive criminal network. While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the all-powerful ring, bringing them face to face with the magical artefact's twisted former owner Gollum. Meanwhile, their allies prepare to make a desperate last stand against the vast armies of the corrupted wizard Saruman, who has declared war on a neighbouring kingdom. Part two of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan, Andy Serkis and Christopher Lee.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Retired soldier Benjamin Martin, who turned his back on the military to become a farmer in South Carolina, takes up arms once more to avenge the unprovoked murder of his son at the hands of the British during the American War of Independence. As he seeks vengeance, he finds himself up against a sadistic officer wreaking havoc in the surrounding area. Roland Emmerich's action adventure, starring Mel Gibson, Jason Isaacs, Heath Ledger and Joely Richardson.

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: James Bond goes rogue after receiving a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a secretive criminal network. While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the all-powerful ring, bringing them face to face with the magical artefact's twisted former owner Gollum. Meanwhile, their allies prepare to make a desperate last stand against the vast armies of the corrupted wizard Saruman, who has declared war on a neighbouring kingdom. Part two of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan, Andy Serkis and Christopher Lee.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: Jimmy Vickers, a rogue SAS officer specialising in interrogation techniques, sets out to take vengeance on the criminal gang that murdered his parents. However, his brutal crusade is placed in jeopardy when it becomes clear the police have teamed up with members of his old unit to stop him completing his mission. Action thriller, starring Danny Dyer, Roxanne McKee and Vincent Regan.

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien arrives on Earth, accompanied by an awesomely powerful robot, on a fateful mission - to decide if the human race deserves to continue - and if not, to wipe it out. The visitor is imprisoned in a military facility, but a scientist helps him escape, hoping to prove that mankind is worth saving. Sci-fi drama remake, starring Keanu Reeves and Jennifer Connelly.(n)

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: A reconnaissance pilot is shot down and becomes stranded in enemy territory after filming evidence of a genocidal massacre by Serb militia in Bosnia. The naval air commander for Nato forces in the Balkans defies orders by mounting an unauthorised mission to rescue him, while the airman faces a battle to stay alive as he is pursued by paramilitary forces. Bosnian War drama, starring Gene Hackman, Owen Wilson, Gabriel Macht and Olek Krupa.(n)

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit II
programme.desc: The maverick haulier must overcome a crisis of confidence when he and his friends are hired to transport a pregnant elephant to Texas, a mammoth task that proves far from easy, especially with their old enemy in hot pursuit. Road comedy, with Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Jerry Reed, Dom DeLuise and Sally Field.(n)

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: The residents of an Arizona mining town are forced to batten down the hatches and reach for the flame-throwers when a chemical waste spill causes hundreds of little spiders to mutate into gigantic flesh-eating monsters - and it is down to the local sheriff to help save the day. Comedy horror, starring David Arquette, Kari Wuhrer, Scarlett Johansson, Scott Terra and Doug E Doug.(n)

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: The dying wife of a retired assassin leaves him a puppy, in the hope that having something to love will stop him returning to a life of violence when she is gone. When the son of a Russian gangster steals his car and kills the dog, the hitman is provoked into a murderous rage and slaughters his way through the underworld in search of revenge. Action thriller, starring Keanu Reeves and Willem Dafoe.(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: As hobbits Frodo and Sam near the end of their journey into the dark lands of Mordor to destroy the One Ring, the evil Sauron unleashes the full might of his armies on Middle-earth. Meanwhile, Aragorn must fulfil his destiny of becoming king by leading his people into a climactic battle with the forces of darkness. Conclusion of the fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen and Sean Astin.(n)

programme.title: Into the Storm
programme.desc: A small town is unexpectedly ravaged by a series of devastating tornados. When it emerges that this was merely part of an even larger crisis, the townsfolk flee for their lives as scientists set out to monitor the event, while thrill-seekers risk their lives for the chance to experience a twister close-up. Disaster movie, starring Richard Armitage and Sarah Wayne Callies.(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: A chance encounter with an old friend derails a successful lawyer's fast-track career, plunging him headlong into a deadly game of cat and mouse with relentless government agents capable of anticipating his every move. He quickly realises the only way to save his own life is to expose the truths his pursuers seem so intent on covering up, and seeks out a former intelligence agent to take them on at their own game. Thriller, starring Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight and Lisa Bonet.(n)

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: The dying wife of a retired assassin leaves him a puppy, in the hope that having something to love will stop him returning to a life of violence when she is gone. When the son of a Russian gangster steals his car and kills the dog, the hitman is provoked into a murderous rage and slaughters his way through the underworld in search of revenge. Action thriller, starring Keanu Reeves and Willem Dafoe.(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: As hobbits Frodo and Sam near the end of their journey into the dark lands of Mordor to destroy the One Ring, the evil Sauron unleashes the full might of his armies on Middle-earth. Meanwhile, Aragorn must fulfil his destiny of becoming king by leading his people into a climactic battle with the forces of darkness. Conclusion of the fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen and Sean Astin.(n)

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: A veteran car thief is forced out of retirement to steal 50 top-of-the-range vehicles in exchange for his brother's life. While his sibling is held hostage by a sadistic gangster, he asks his former cronies to help - but with the clock ticking and just a few days remaining to pull off the daunting task, their chances of success are hanging by a thread. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Angelina Jolie, Giovanni Ribisi and Robert Duvall.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Jedi Knights Obi-Wan Kenobi and Qui-Gon Jinn are instructed to protect Queen Amidala when her planet is invaded. Escorting her away from danger, they meet gifted youngster Anakin Skywalker, who seems ideally suited to join the pair's order - but is unaware of just how powerful he could become. Sci-fi prequel, starring Liam Neeson, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman and Ray Park.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Master Fisto and Vebb are held prisoner by Dooku in Grievous' own fortress, has Vebb enough experience to survive?.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Part one of two. Anakin and Obi-Wan track down Count Dooku, only to find their enemy has already been captured by space pirates.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Part two of two. Obi-Wan and Anakin must join forces with Count Dooku to escape their captors.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Ahsoka must take charge when Anakin is badly injured.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: A pacifist alien race must choose a side when their planet becomes a battleground.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Anakin and Obi-Wan are caught in the middle of a conflict on an ice planet.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: A traitor threatens Anakin and Obi-Wan's mission to retake a planet conquered by the Separatists.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Part one of two. Padme discovers the separatists have created a deadly virus as a weapon against the Jedi. When Padme and Jar Jar are captured on Naboo, Anakin, Obi-Wan and Ahsoka race to save them, but while on the rescue mission, they discover a deadly secret.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Part two of two. Ahsoka, Padme and Jar Jar seal themselves in a lab to stop the virus spreading. Anakin and Obi-Wan race to find the antidote on a dangerous planet.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Part one of three. Ahsoka strives to redeem herself after disobeying orders with catastrophic consequences.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Part two of three. The Jedi discover the separatists have enslaved the entire population of the planet Ryloth.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Mace Windu leads the final assault to liberate Ryloth and take the Separatist General. Outnumbered, Mace turns to a Twi'lek outlaw for assistance.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: After sneaking into the Senate to see Padme, Anakin is left alone and unarmed against a group of heavy mercenaries who have taken control of the building.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: After disobeying orders, Ahsoka is sent to guard the Jedi Archives, where Sidious has sent a bounty hunter to try to steal an important Holocron.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Anakin and Ahsoka try to stop Bane escaping from the Archives with the Holocron, because it has details of every Force-sensitive child in the universe.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Cad Bane goes in search of children with Force powers so they can be turned to the dark side.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
programme.desc: Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and apprentice Anakin Skywalker are sent to protect Senator Padme Amidala from an assassin. However, as galactic civil war threatens to erupt, the pair are forced to split their efforts, leading Anakin into an ill-advised romance and the beginnings of a journey toward the dark side. George Lucas's second prequel to the original sci-fi trilogy, starring Ewan McGregor, Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman and Christopher Lee.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: Troubled Anakin Skywalker finds himself seduced by the dark side of the Force and is tempted into betraying his fellow Jedi Knights as conflict erupts across countless planets and the forces of evil prepare to seize control of the galaxy. The final instalment of the sci-fi prequel trilogy, with Hayden Christensen, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman, Samuel L Jackson, Ian McDiarmid and Christopher Lee.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
programme.desc: Farm boy Luke Skywalker is thrust into an intergalactic battle between good and evil while trying to rescue a spirited princess from the clutches of the evil Darth Vader. En route, he is helped by a cocky space pilot, a veteran warrior, two bickering robots and a hairy 8ft alien. Sci-fi adventure directed by George Lucas, with Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness and Peter Cushing.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
programme.desc: The rebels are scattered across the galaxy after the Empire launches a devastating attack on their secret base. Luke Skywalker searches out a Jedi master to complete his training, while Han Solo and Princess Leia are relentlessly pursued by Darth Vader's space fleet. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Harrison Ford, Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams, Alec Guinness and David Prowse.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
programme.desc: The rebel heroes set out to rescue Han Solo from the clutches of alien gangster Jabba the Hutt before preparing for a decisive attack on the evil Empire. Meanwhile, Luke Skywalker faces a more personal battle in a final confrontation with Darth Vader that leads him to the inner sanctum of the Emperor himself. Conclusion of the original sci-fi trilogy, starring Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford and Carrie Fisher.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Padme is assigned to spy on a Senator she once had a relationship with and who is suspected of being an enemy agent.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Obi-Wan and Anakin form a plan of attack on the Geonosian droid factory, but little do they know the Separatists are expecting them.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Luminara and Anakin's plan to create a diversion on the droid factory comes into effect, leaving their Padawans free to sneak inside and destroy the building.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Obi-Wan and Anakin face a tough battle through the Geonosian drones to find Luminara, who has been taken captive to their Queen as a trophy of war.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: A spaceship is infested by mind-controlling worms, and Ahsoka must fight off her own crew to contain the plague.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Anakin and Obi-Wan must rescue a Jedi master who has been captured by General Grievous - but discover they are heading into a trap.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: As Grievous attempts to escape, Obi-Wan and his Clones must try to stop him. Meanwhile, an injured Rex is treated by a deserter Clone.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: When Ahsoka's Lightsaber is stolen, a retired Jedi helps by teaching her the value of patience, but Ahsoka has some lessons of her own to teach.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Obi-Wan and Satine investigate rumours that the Mandalorians have sided with the Separatists, in fear that they may have resurrected their Death Watch army.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: While in transit to Coruscant, assassin droids infiltrate the Jedi ship. While defending Satine, Obi-Wan realises he still has strong feelings for her.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: When Satine is accused of murder, the Senate orders an invasion of Mandalore. Obi-Wan faces a race against time to prove the Separatists are behind it all.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: When a senator who backed the vote to stop clone production is murdered, Padme and Bail uncover a conspiracy, but have trouble knowing who they can trust to uncover the truth.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Obi-Wan and Anakin must combine their tactical expertise and brashness when they meet their toughest challenge yet - the cunning Separatist Admiral Trench.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: While stranded on a distant planet, Obi-Wan, Anakin and Ahsoka join with mercenaries to protect local farmers from a tough gang intent on stealing valuable crops.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Chancellor Palpatine's new super weapon awakens a powerful monster, which the Jedi must stop from going on the rampage.(n)

George Lucas's second prequel to the original sci-fi trilogy, starring Ewan McGregor, Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: Planes: Fire & Rescue
programme.desc: A racing plane suffers damage to his engine, and realises he can never compete again. He starts a new career as a member of a firefighting squadron, which proves more dangerous than he expected when the aircraft have to deal with a massive forest blaze. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Dane Cook and Ed Harris.

programme.title: Stitch! The Movie
programme.desc: Animation following the further adventures of the little alien, as a host of his fellow experimental creatures arrive on Earth. However, their chaotic efforts to make themselves at home are threatened by the evil Captain Gantu, who is hot on their heels and determined to capture them. With the voices of Chris Sanders, Daveigh Chase, Ving Rhames and David Ogden Stiers.

programme.title: Old Dogs
programme.desc: An uptight PR executive on the verge of an important business deal discovers he is the father of seven-year-old twins, and that he will be responsible for looking after them while their mother spends two weeks in jail. Clueless about how to deal with children, he turns to his friend and business partner for help. Comedy, starring John Travolta, Robin Williams and Bernie Mac in his final role.

programme.title: The Return of Jafar
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel to Disney movie Aladdin. Iago unwittingly frees evil Jafar from the genie's lamp, leaving the hero and his magical friend battling against the odds to save the day again. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Jason Alexander, Gilbert Gottfried and Scott Weinger.

programme.title: The Emperor's New Groove
programme.desc: A spoilt and uncaring emperor learns the importance of treating people fairly when a sorceress turns him into a llama so she can seize power herself. His only hope of getting his kingdom back is to seek the help of a peasant he had previously mistreated. Animated Disney comedy, featuring the voices of David Spade, John Goodman, Patrick Warburton and Eartha Kitt.

programme.title: Big Hero 6
programme.desc: A lonely, orphaned computer genius forms a special bond with an inflatable robot. When a devastating event occurs in their futuristic home city, they join forces with a group of friends to form a hi-tech group of heroes who are determined to get to the bottom of the matter. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit and Daniel Henney.

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: An orphaned girl is treated as a servant by her cruel stepmother and her two daughters. Her life is changed for ever by the intervention of a kindly fairy godmother, who gives her the opportunity to attend a lavish royal and win the heart of a handsome prince. Romantic fantasy, starring Lily James, Cate Blanchett, Richard Madden and Helena Bonham Carter.

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: Three children are visited in the night by a magical flying boy and a fairy named Tinker Bell. The strange youngster takes them away to his home, the magical island of Neverland, where his band of runaway youngsters are engaged in an ongoing battle with a crew of pirates. Disney animated adventure based on JM Barrie's novel, with the voices of Bobby Driscoll and Hans Conried.

programme.title: Your Friend the Rat
programme.desc: Animated short, in which Remy and Emile, the rodent characters from Ratatouille, try to convince the human race that their species is not as unpleasant as they seem and demonstrate the relationship between people and rats throughout history. With the voices of Patton Oswalt and Peter Sohn.

programme.title: The Fox and the Hound
programme.desc: An orphaned fox cub is taken in by a kindly widow, and becomes firm friends with a puppy belonging to a hunter. However, as they grow to adulthood, the dog is trained to prey on foxes, and the two animals realise their friendship may not survive as they are expected to be natural enemies. Animated adventure, with the voices of Mickey Rooney and Kurt Russell.

programme.title: Cinderella III: A Twist in Time
programme.desc: Cinderella's wicked stepmother steals the Fairy Godmother's magic wand, enabling her to turn back time and ensure her stepdaughter does not attend Prince Charming's lavish ball. Cinderella's rodent pals Jaq and Gus help the distraught heroine to break the evil spell before it's too late. Disney's animated fantasy sequel, with the voices of Jennifer Hale, CD Barnes and Russi Taylor.

programme.title: The Black Cauldron
programme.desc: A pig farmer struggles to stop an evil king taking control of a supernatural cauldron with the power to grant immortality, and sets out to bring an end to the villain's reign of terror with a trusty band of friends. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of John Hurt, Grant Bardsley and Nigel Hawthorne.

programme.title: The Emperor's New Groove
programme.desc: A spoilt and uncaring emperor learns the importance of treating people fairly when a sorceress turns him into a llama so she can seize power herself. His only hope of getting his kingdom back is to seek the help of a peasant he had previously mistreated. Animated Disney comedy, featuring the voices of David Spade, John Goodman, Patrick Warburton and Eartha Kitt.(n)

programme.title: Mulan II
programme.desc: The warrior heroine is assigned as a bodyguard to three princesses by the emperor of China. When she learns the girls are to be forced into marriage, she decides to help them escape - jeopardising her relationship with her fiance, who remains loyal to the emperor. Disney animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Ming-Na and Lucy Liu.(n)

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Legend of the NeverBeast
programme.desc: One of Tinker Bell's friends meets a large hairy monster, and discovers he is not as fearsome as he looks. However, she has a hard time convincing the other fairies to accept him, and needs the help of her friends to protect the creature. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Ginnifer Goodwin and Rosario Dawson.(n)

programme.title: Inside Out: Special
programme.desc: The making of the Pixar animation, taking viewers inside the mind of a youngster as she copes with the emotional upheaval of moving to a new town and new school.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella III: A Twist in Time
programme.desc: Cinderella's wicked stepmother steals the Fairy Godmother's magic wand, enabling her to turn back time and ensure her stepdaughter does not attend Prince Charming's lavish ball. Cinderella's rodent pals Jaq and Gus help the distraught heroine to break the evil spell before it's too late. Disney's animated fantasy sequel, with the voices of Jennifer Hale, CD Barnes and Russi Taylor.(n)

programme.title: The Sword in the Stone
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure about King Arthur's first childhood encounter with the absent-minded magician Merlin in a forest. The kindly wizard takes the youngster under his wing and teaches him the ways of the world - leading to an incident with a crazed witch and the event that will change the future king's life for ever. With the voices of Rickie Sorenson, Karl Swenson and Martha Wentworth.(n)

programme.title: Cars
programme.desc: Arrogant racing car Lightning McQueen's dreams of winning the Piston Cup are put on hold when he loses his way and ends up in a forgotten town on Route 66. When the locals insist he mend the road he inadvertently ruined, the smug speedster gradually becomes accustomed to a quieter pace of life and learns a lesson in humility. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Owen Wilson and Paul Newman, in his final film.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungle, leading a carefree life with his friends, a laidback bear and a wise panther. The return of a ferocious tiger who hates humans places the youngster's life in danger, and his friends must persuade him to return to the safety of his own people. Disney animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, with the voices of Phil Harris and George Sanders.(n)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Well-meaning ant Flik lands his colony in trouble when he accidentally disposes of an offering meant for a swarm of greedy grasshoppers - who promptly promise a horrible revenge. Faced with the imminent destruction of the anthill, he sets out to save the situation by enlisting the help of a few would-be heroes - an out-of-work troupe of bugs from a low-rent flea circus. Pixar animation, with the voices of Dave Foley, Kevin Spacey and Julia Louis-Dreyfus.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungle, leading a carefree life with his friends, a laidback bear and a wise panther. The return of a ferocious tiger who hates humans places the youngster's life in danger, and his friends must persuade him to return to the safety of his own people. Disney animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, with the voices of Phil Harris and George Sanders.(n)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Well-meaning ant Flik lands his colony in trouble when he accidentally disposes of an offering meant for a swarm of greedy grasshoppers - who promptly promise a horrible revenge. Faced with the imminent destruction of the anthill, he sets out to save the situation by enlisting the help of a few would-be heroes - an out-of-work troupe of bugs from a low-rent flea circus. Pixar animation, with the voices of Dave Foley, Kevin Spacey and Julia Louis-Dreyfus.(n)

programme.title: The Sword in the Stone
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure about King Arthur's first childhood encounter with the absent-minded magician Merlin in a forest. The kindly wizard takes the youngster under his wing and teaches him the ways of the world - leading to an incident with a crazed witch and the event that will change the future king's life for ever. With the voices of Rickie Sorenson, Karl Swenson and Martha Wentworth.(n)

programme.title: Treasure Island
programme.desc: An innkeeper's son discovers a map leading to notorious pirate Captain Flint's buried loot, and joins a seafaring expedition to find it. However, several of Flint's henchmen are among the crew, and under the leadership of the one-legged cook Long John Silver, they hatch a plan to steal the treasure. Disney adventure, based on Robert Louis Stevenson's novel, with Robert Newton and Bobby Driscoll.(n)

programme.title: Friday Download: The Movie
programme.desc: A group of teenagers on a road trip breaks down in the middle of nowhere, and finds assistance is in short supply. The friends seek shelter in a spooky mansion, but they quickly discover there is more to their refuge than meets the eye. Comedy based on the children's TV series, starring Tyger Drew-Honey and Shannon Flynn.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A teenager at a new school befriends a pretty girl, but her ex-boyfriend is jealous and attacks him. During one particularly bad fight, a wise old caretaker intervenes and defeats the youngster's assailants using his martial art skills. He goes on to mentor the boy and teach him karate so he can face his enemies in a tournament. Drama, with Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Elisabeth Shue.

programme.title: The Rocketeer
programme.desc: A maverick pilot in 1930s Hollywood finds an experimental rocket pack that gives him the power to fly. While he plans to use the device in a stunt act, a Nazi spy masquerading as a movie star is also determined to get his hands on it. Sci-fi adventure, starring Bill Campbell, Jennifer Connelly, Timothy Dalton, Alan Arkin and Terry O'Quinn.

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Eccentric inventor Caractacus Potts rescues an old car from the scrapheap, only to discover it has magical, gravity-defying powers. Meanwhile, Baron Bomburst, the blundering ruler of Vulgaria, will do anything to get his greedy hands on it. Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: The bumbling security guard is invited to attend a conference in Las Vegas, and brings his teenage daughter along for a family holiday before she leaves for college. However, he is forced to leap into action when he uncovers a gang of criminals are plotting a casino heist. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Raini Rodriguez.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Nightwatchman Larry notices that the living exhibits of his museum are behaving strangely. He discovers that the magical artefact that brings them to life is damaged, so he and his friends travel to London's Natural History Museum to find a way to restore it. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Rebel Wilson and Robin Williams in his final film role.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The young wizard and his friends return for their second term at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry to discover a strange serpentine power is petrifying the other students. Meanwhile, Harry is haunted by a sinister voice in his head urging him to uncover the dark force that is stalking the corridors of the school. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson and Kenneth Branagh.

programme.title: Kermit's Swamp Years
programme.desc: The fast-talking frog sets out in pursuit of a kidnapper who has abducted his friend. Leaving the safety of his marshland home, he follows a trail that leads him to the bright lights of Hollywood - but he also has to contend with an evil scientist along the way. Muppet comedy adventure, with Christian Kebbel and the voices of Steve Whitmire, Dave Goelz and Bill Baretta.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: The bumbling security guard is invited to attend a conference in Las Vegas, and brings his teenage daughter along for a family holiday before she leaves for college. However, he is forced to leap into action when he uncovers a gang of criminals are plotting a casino heist. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Raini Rodriguez.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Nightwatchman Larry notices that the living exhibits of his museum are behaving strangely. He discovers that the magical artefact that brings them to life is damaged, so he and his friends travel to London's Natural History Museum to find a way to restore it. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Rebel Wilson and Robin Williams in his final film role.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The young wizard and his friends return for their second term at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry to discover a strange serpentine power is petrifying the other students. Meanwhile, Harry is haunted by a sinister voice in his head urging him to uncover the dark force that is stalking the corridors of the school. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson and Kenneth Branagh.

programme.title: Robot Overlords
programme.desc: In a world controlled by a robots, the human population is constantly monitored and is unable to venture outside. However, a boy manages to turn off his personal surveillance device, enabling him to begin a search for his long-lost father, who may hold the key to saving humanity. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Ben Kingsley, Gillian Anderson and Callan McAuliffe.

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Eccentric inventor Caractacus Potts rescues an old car from the scrapheap, only to discover it has magical, gravity-defying powers. Meanwhile, Baron Bomburst, the blundering ruler of Vulgaria, will do anything to get his greedy hands on it. Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice.(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: High-kicking teenager Daniel accompanies his venerable mentor Mr Miyagi when he returns to the Japanese province of Okinawa to visit his dying father. However, an old rival of Miyagi's is waiting for them, while Daniel is drawn into a vicious conflict with their enemy's own karate protege. Martial arts sequel, starring Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Yuji Okumoto.(n)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
programme.desc: The amateur detectives attend the grand opening of a museum in their honour, featuring the costumes from all the fake monsters they exposed. The exhibits are stolen by a masked villain, who sets about re-creating all the gang's worst enemies. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr and Linda Cardellini.(n)

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: A boy becomes obsessed with a sinister elderly neighbour living in a creepy old house. On Halloween night, he and two friends discover the chilling truth - the house is alive and eats anything that comes too close, including children. Animated comedy horror, with the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Lee.(n)

programme.title: Finding Pixar
programme.desc: Alex Zane heads to Pixar's San Francisco headquarters to go behind-the-scenes on the making of Finding Dory, and investigate the secret of the studio's remarkable success.(n)

programme.title: Maya the Bee Movie
programme.desc: A curious young bee befriends a number of other insects, despite her hive's strict rules on not associating with outsiders. When some of the Queen bee's royal jelly is stolen, she is accused of the crime and needs the help of her friends to track down the real culprits. Animated adventure based on Waldemar Bonsels' children's book, with the voices of Coco Jack Gillies and Kodi Smit-McPhee.(n)

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: A 12-year-old orphan is abducted and taken away to a magical land by a band of pirates, who need child labour to mine a magical substance created by fairies. He escapes, joining forces with a roguish adventurer, and goes in search of the truth about his mother and his own destiny. Fantasy adventure prequel to Peter Pan, starring Levi Miller, Hugh Jackman, Garrett Hedlund and Rooney Mara.(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: The teenage wizard is alarmed to learn a dangerous fugitive sorcerer is searching for him. Meanwhile, a new teacher at Hogwarts helps the bespectacled youngster to protect himself from the school's soul-sucking security guards. The third in the fantasy adventure series, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Gary Oldman, David Thewlis, Michael Gambon, Robbie Coltrane and Alan Rickman.(n)

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent becomes Britain's leading spy following the assassination of all the country's other espionage experts. Single-handedly he sets out to unmask a mysterious villain responsible for stealing the Crown Jewels - but no one is prepared to believe a sinister billionaire is the culprit. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, John Malkovich, Natalie Imbruglia and Ben Miller.(n)

programme.title: Maya the Bee Movie
programme.desc: A curious young bee befriends a number of other insects, despite her hive's strict rules on not associating with outsiders. When some of the Queen bee's royal jelly is stolen, she is accused of the crime and needs the help of her friends to track down the real culprits. Animated adventure based on Waldemar Bonsels' children's book, with the voices of Coco Jack Gillies and Kodi Smit-McPhee.(n)

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: A 12-year-old orphan is abducted and taken away to a magical land by a band of pirates, who need child labour to mine a magical substance created by fairies. He escapes, joining forces with a roguish adventurer, and goes in search of the truth about his mother and his own destiny. Fantasy adventure prequel to Peter Pan, starring Levi Miller, Hugh Jackman, Garrett Hedlund and Rooney Mara.(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: The teenage wizard is alarmed to learn a dangerous fugitive sorcerer is searching for him. Meanwhile, a new teacher at Hogwarts helps the bespectacled youngster to protect himself from the school's soul-sucking security guards. The third in the fantasy adventure series, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Gary Oldman, David Thewlis, Michael Gambon, Robbie Coltrane and Alan Rickman.(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Adolescent wizard Harry is unexpectedly chosen to represent Hogwarts School in a prestigious magical tournament, despite being legally too young to enter. Along with charming sixth-year student Cedric Diggory, Harry is chosen to represent Hogwarts in the contest, with champions of two other magical academies visiting the school to face deadly monsters in a series of death-defying challenges. Meanwhile, the followers of the dreaded Lord Voldemort plot to restore their master to the land of the living. Fourth instalment of the fantasy saga, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Robbie Coltrane, Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson, Brendan Gleeson and Robert Pattinson.(n)

programme.title: Mean Machine
programme.desc: A disgraced soccer star jailed for assaulting two policemen is persuaded by the prison authorities to form a football team of inmates to take on the guards. Unfortunately, whipping his fellow prisoners into shape proves a tricky proposition. Comedy drama, starring Vinnie Jones, Jason Statham, David Hemmings and Jason Flemyng.

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: American Heist
programme.desc: A man with a shady past is planning to start his own business, but is drawn back into the criminal underworld when his brother is released from prison. The ex-convict has a dangerous plan for an elaborate bank robbery, and family loyalty drives his brother to get involved. Crime drama, starring Adrien Brody, Hayden Christensen and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A top-secret government agency has developed a seemingly unbreakable code - only for an autistic boy to crack it in an instant. Assassins succeed in gunning down his parents, but a maverick FBI agent investigating their deaths finds the child hiding in a closet, and resolves to shield him from the hitmen on his trail. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alec Baldwin and Miko Hughes.

programme.title: The Pelican Brief
programme.desc: A talented law student submits a brief about an obscure case linked to the assassinations of two judges. However, she unwittingly gets too close to the truth that the government is behind the murders and seeks a journalist's aide in proving her theory before she is assassinated. Legal thriller based on the book by John Grisham, starring Julia Roberts, Denzel Washington, Stanley Tucci and Sam Shepard.

programme.title: Enemy
programme.desc: A professor who has become bored with his routine life spots a man in a film who looks exactly like him. He becomes obsessed with finding out who the actor playing the role is, and develops an intense relationship with his double's pregnant wife. Thriller based on the novel by Jose Saramago, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Melanie Laurent and Isabella Rossellini.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A veteran con man takes a young femme fatale under his wing, but dumps her when their relationship looks set to turn to love. Three years later, they cross paths again - and it seems his former protege is about to use the skills he taught her to scupper his latest heist. Comedy crime drama, starring Will Smith and Margot Robbie.

programme.title: The Runner
programme.desc: A politician's idealistic attitude to his career is contrasted by a disastrous personal life. He is forced to rethink his priorities when a sex scandal brings his reputation into disrepute in the aftermath of a catastrophic oil spill. Drama, starring Nicolas Cage, Sarah Paulson, Connie Nielsen and Peter Fonda.

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: An imprisoned art thief and forger learns that his son is dying, and applies for early release. While his request is granted, he learns that the shady characters who granted his freedom want him to assist them in a daring heist, leaving him torn between carrying out the robbery and making his son's last wishes come true. Crime thriller, starring John Travolta and Christopher Plummer.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A top-secret government agency has developed a seemingly unbreakable code - only for an autistic boy to crack it in an instant. Assassins succeed in gunning down his parents, but a maverick FBI agent investigating their deaths finds the child hiding in a closet, and resolves to shield him from the hitmen on his trail. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alec Baldwin and Miko Hughes.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A veteran con man takes a young femme fatale under his wing, but dumps her when their relationship looks set to turn to love. Three years later, they cross paths again - and it seems his former protege is about to use the skills he taught her to scupper his latest heist. Comedy crime drama, starring Will Smith and Margot Robbie.

programme.title: French Connection II
programme.desc: Hard-nosed New York narcotics cop Popeye Doyle pursues a drug dealer to his lair in Marseille. However, he soon lives to regret his decision when he is captured by the criminal and subjected to a cruel revenge by being forcibly addicted to heroin. John Frankenheimer's thriller sequel, starring Gene Hackman, Fernando Rey, Bernard Fresson, Jean-Pierre Castaldi and Charles Millot.

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: A CIA agent is diagnosed with a degenerative condition that results in him being forced to retire from the world of intelligence. When he receives word that a terrorist who once tortured him has resurfaced, he goes rogue and sets out to assassinate the man while he is still able. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Anton Yelchin and Irene Jacob.(n)

programme.title: Return to Sender
programme.desc: A small-town nurse goes on a blind date with a stranger who rapes her. As she struggles to rebuild her life, she takes to regularly visiting her attacker in prison. However, when he is released, he discovers she has been planning her revenge. Thriller, starring Rosamund Pike, Shiloh Fernandez and Nick Nolte.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: The Calling
programme.desc: A small-town cop with a drink problem discovers someone is mutilating and murdering people across her district. She realises that the serial killer is hiding a mysterious message inspired by ancient religious texts and becomes dangerously obsessed with deciphering its meaning. Crime thriller based on Inger Ash Wolfe's novel, starring Susan Sarandon and Donald Sutherland.(n)

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Two marines based in Cuba stand accused of murdering a comrade-in-arms. Three Navy lawyers working on their defence unearth evidence that the soldiers may have been acting under orders, which points to a trail of corruption leading all the way to a top-ranking officer. Drama based on Aaron Sorkin's stage play, starring Tom Cruise, Demi Moore, Kevin Pollack, Jack Nicholson, Kiefer Sutherland and Kevin Bacon.(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Two marines based in Cuba stand accused of murdering a comrade-in-arms. Three Navy lawyers working on their defence unearth evidence that the soldiers may have been acting under orders, which points to a trail of corruption leading all the way to a top-ranking officer. Drama based on Aaron Sorkin's stage play, starring Tom Cruise, Demi Moore, Kevin Pollack, Jack Nicholson, Kiefer Sutherland and Kevin Bacon.(n)

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: A reformed criminal's daughter is murdered, and he becomes convinced she was killed at the order of a Russian gangster he once stole from. He and his former partners in crime launch a campaign of violence against the mobster and his cronies, but his wife begins to fear for what his mission of vengeance will turn him into. Crime thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Danny Glover.(n)

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: A boxing champion's successful life is brought to an abrupt end when tragedy strikes. He turns to a trainer coaching amateur fighters in a run-down gym for help and tries to rebuild his sporting career - while also striving to regain the lost trust of his wife and daughter. Drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Forest Whitaker and Rachel McAdams.(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A retired secret agent applies his talents to the task of helping victims of injustice. When he witnesses a prostitute being beaten up by a pimp, he kills the man, an act that draws him into a battle to the death with a Russian crime syndicate. Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz.(n)

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: Maverick cop Dirty Harry Callahan antagonises his superiors once more in his pursuit of a vigilante group responsible for murdering the city's most wanted criminals. However, he is unaware that the killers are some of his fellow officers - and are prepared to see him dead to keep their secret safe. Action thriller sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Hal Holbrook, Mitchell Ryan, David Soul and Robert Urich.(n)

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby
programme.desc: A couple move into a new apartment, and the husband forms a close friendship with their elderly neighbours. The wife soon becomes pregnant, and starts to suspect her spouse has been seduced into a Satanic cult, who have sinister plans for her baby. Roman Polanski's horror, based on the novel by Ira Levin, and starring Mia Farrow, John Cassavetes, Oscar-winner Ruth Gordon, Sidney Blackmer and Ralph Bellamy.

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: A retired police detective and his family break down taking a short cut on a remote road and later find themselves attacked by savage and deformed victims of a nuclear testing project. Remake of the 1970s horror, starring Kathleen Quinlan, Aaron Stanford, Vinessa Shaw, Ted Levine, Emilie de Ravin and Dan Byrd.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.

programme.title: Suicide Squad: Special
programme.desc: The making of the DC movie about a group of super-villains thrown together on a mission to save the world, including behind-the-scenes footage and cast interviews.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A spaceship crash-lands on a mysterious planet where humans are mute creatures who find themselves at the mercy of intelligent apes. The world's simian rulers are horrified when one of the crew reveals he can speak and plan to have him killed, but two chimpanzee scientists intervene, determined to learn from the new arrival. Sci-fi drama, starring Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter and Maurice Evans.

programme.title: Maggie
programme.desc: A virus sweeps across America turning people into zombies, and the government establishes measures to capture those infected and dispose of them once the process is complete. When a teenage girl is infected, her devoted father refuses to hand her over to the authorities, and vows to defend her to the bitter end. Horror, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Abigail Breslin.

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Fugitive Riddick evades capture by bounty hunters and steals their spacecraft, only to run into an even bigger threat - fanatical cult members on a sinister mission to kill or convert anyone who crosses their path as they seek galactic domination. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandie Newton.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A spaceship crash-lands on a mysterious planet where humans are mute creatures who find themselves at the mercy of intelligent apes. The world's simian rulers are horrified when one of the crew reveals he can speak and plan to have him killed, but two chimpanzee scientists intervene, determined to learn from the new arrival. Sci-fi drama, starring Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter and Maurice Evans.

Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.

Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandie Newton.
