programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.(n)

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A father tries to resurrect his dead son by placing him in an enchanted burial ground but the plan backfires with devastating results. Horror, starring Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne and Denise Crosby, with a cameo appearance by author Stephen King, whose book provided the basis for the film.(n)

programme.title: Pet Sematary II
programme.desc: A boy's dog is killed by his abusive father, so he and his friend bury the animal in a place believed to hold the power of resurrection. Miraculously, the dog returns to the land of the living, but with a vicious new temperament, and savages the boy's father to death. The terrified son decides to try in turn to resurrect his parent, but with horrific consequences. Horror sequel, with Edward Furlong and Anthony Edwards.(n)

programme.title: Babylon AD
programme.desc: A mercenary in a post-apocalyptic future accepts a job escorting a mysterious girl and the nun protecting her from Russia to New York. Along the way, she exhibits strange powers that could hold the key to mankind's salvation - but various factions are plotting to put her gifts to their own use. Sci-fi adventure, starring Vin Diesel, Michelle Yeoh, Melanie Thierry, Gerard Depardieu and Charlotte Rampling.(n)

programme.title: De@th on Live
programme.desc: In the future, people use cameras built into contact lenses to record their lives and broadcast the footage to an online audience. A soldier returns home from duty to learn that his brother has died. Suspecting foul play, he enters the `Channeling' subculture to learn the truth. Sci-fi thriller, starring Taylor Handley and Kate French.(n)

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Zombie-battling hero Ash is transported back in time to the medieval era. In an attempt to find a way back to his own time, he accidentally summons up a horde of living skeletons led by his own evil double and must fight to send them back to the grave. Comedy fantasy adventure sequel to The Evil Dead, starring Bruce Campbell and Embeth Davidtz.(n)

programme.title: Project Almanac
programme.desc: Following the death of his inventor father, a teenager finds plans for a time-travel device. He and his friends decide to build it, and together they embark on an amazing adventure back in time - but soon discover the perils of altering history. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jonny Weston, Sofia Black-D'Elia and Sam Lerner.(n)

programme.title: Terminator Genisys
programme.desc: A soldier fighting in a post-apocalyptic war against living machines is sent back in time to prevent an attempt to change the past - but when he arrives, he finds that history has been changed beyond recognition - and that a plot is being hatched by an unexpected enemy to destroy the future of the human race. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Emilia Clarke.(n)

programme.title: Predestination
programme.desc: A time travelling secret agent journeys back and forth through history in search of a bomber who has eluded him throughout his career. His final assignment requires him to finally apprehend the criminal, while also ensuring that his own past takes place as he remembers. Sci-fi thriller based on a short story by Robert Heinlein, starring Ethan Hawke, Sarah Snook and Noah Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Babylon AD
programme.desc: A mercenary in a post-apocalyptic future accepts a job escorting a mysterious girl and the nun protecting her from Russia to New York. Along the way, she exhibits strange powers that could hold the key to mankind's salvation - but various factions are plotting to put her gifts to their own use. Sci-fi adventure, starring Vin Diesel, Michelle Yeoh, Melanie Thierry, Gerard Depardieu and Charlotte Rampling.(n)

programme.title: Project Almanac
programme.desc: Following the death of his inventor father, a teenager finds plans for a time-travel device. He and his friends decide to build it, and together they embark on an amazing adventure back in time - but soon discover the perils of altering history. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jonny Weston, Sofia Black-D'Elia and Sam Lerner.(n)

programme.title: Terminator Genisys
programme.desc: A soldier fighting in a post-apocalyptic war against living machines is sent back in time to prevent an attempt to change the past - but when he arrives, he finds that history has been changed beyond recognition - and that a plot is being hatched by an unexpected enemy to destroy the future of the human race. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Emilia Clarke.(n)

programme.title: Predestination
programme.desc: A time travelling secret agent journeys back and forth through history in search of a bomber who has eluded him throughout his career. His final assignment requires him to finally apprehend the criminal, while also ensuring that his own past takes place as he remembers. Sci-fi thriller based on a short story by Robert Heinlein, starring Ethan Hawke, Sarah Snook and Noah Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Northwest
programme.desc: A teenage burglar uses his ill-gotten gains to support his mother and younger brother. Longing for a more profitable line of work, he gets involved with a gangster, but soon he and his sibling are in over their heads as they are drawn into a world of drugs and prostitution. Crime drama, starring real-life brothers Gustav and Oscar Dyekjaer Giese. In Danish.

programme.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
programme.desc: A rebellious convict gets himself sent to a psychiatric hospital, thinking it will be easier than prison. Finding himself surrounded by institutionalised patients, he encourages them to rebel against the tyrannical head nurse. Milos Forman's Oscar-winning drama based on Ken Kesey's novel, starring Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Brad Dourif and Danny DeVito.

programme.title: Niagara
programme.desc: Polly and Ray are on honeymoon at Niagara Falls where they meet George and Rose, whose own marriage is falling apart. Polly later discovers that the brazen and alluring Rose has a lover waiting in the shadows and they are scheming to kill the emotionally unstable George - but the newlywed is unable to convince anyone of the danger as the murder plot edges toward a tragic conclusion. Thriller, with Marilyn Monroe, Joseph Cotten and Jean Peters.

programme.title: Hell Is for Heroes
programme.desc: A rebellious soldier defies orders to lead two men on a secret attack on a German pillbox, but his mission fails and the other two soldiers are killed. Court-martialled for his actions, he remains convinced his plan was sound and ignores the sentence to make a second attempt at destroying the emplacement. Second World War adventure, with Steve McQueen, James Coburn and Bobby Darin.

programme.title: Magic in the Moonlight
programme.desc: An English magician who exposes fake psychics is approached by his friend to prove that a medium is a fraud exploiting a wealthy family. As he watches the spiritualist at work, he begins to believe that she is the genuine article, challenging his previously unshakeable scepticism. Woody Allen's 1920s-set romantic comedy, with Colin Firth and Emma Stone.

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: A college's most slobbish and unruly student fraternity faces expulsion for upsetting the rigid social order of the campus, so its madcap members plan one final act of rebellion against the college dean and a preppy bunch of snobbish bullies at the annual university homecoming parade. Comedy, starring John Belushi, Tim Matheson, Donald Sutherland, Karen Allen and Tom Hulce.

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: An inexperienced financial trader is taken under the wing of a corrupt New York corporate raider, who draws him into the shady world of illegal insider dealing with promises of money and power. But the trainee stockbroker questions the morality of his actions when the consequences of a deal strike close to home. Oliver Stone's Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Douglas, father and son Martin and Charlie Sheen, Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp.

programme.title: How to Marry a Millionaire
programme.desc: Three women rent a luxurious New York apartment as part of a scheme to get their claws into wealthy husbands - but their plans become unstuck when all three start to fall for men with good hearts and empty pockets. Comedy, starring Betty Grable, Marilyn Monroe, Lauren Bacall, William Powell, Cameron Mitchell, David Wayne, Rory Calhoun and Fred Clark.

programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: British broadcaster and journalist David Frost comes up with the idea of setting up a series of exclusive televised interviews with the disgraced former president of the United States, Richard Nixon. Believing he could use the publicity as a chance to resurrect his political career and make some easy money, Nixon agrees but soon realises he has underestimated Frost. Fact-based drama, starring Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Sam Rockwell and Kevin Bacon.

programme.title: The Birds
programme.desc: A San Francisco socialite takes a shine to a man she meets by chance, and follows him home to a Californian coastal community. Her arrival coincides with a series of mysterious attacks on people by birds, which soon escalates as vast flocks go on the warpath. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller, based on a Daphne du Maurier short story, starring Tippi Hedren, Rod Taylor, Suzanne Pleshette, Jessica Tandy and Veronica Cartwright.

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: A lonely student finds her first year at university in New York a disappointing experience, with uninspiring studies and no social life. Everything changes when her mother remarries and she acquires a new stepsister, whose bizarre schemes draw her into the kind of lifestyle she had always dreamed of - and provide fresh creative inspiration. Comedy, starring Lola Kirke and Greta Gerwig.

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: An inexperienced financial trader is taken under the wing of a corrupt New York corporate raider, who draws him into the shady world of illegal insider dealing with promises of money and power. But the trainee stockbroker questions the morality of his actions when the consequences of a deal strike close to home. Oliver Stone's Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Douglas, father and son Martin and Charlie Sheen, Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp.

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager relishes her newfound freedom when her mother goes missing, seizing the opportunity to flirt with the boy next door and a cop on the case. Over time, she begins to realise what she has lost and finds the unexplained details of the disappearance haunting her. Mystery based on Laura Kasischke's novel, starring Shailene Woodley and Eva Green.

programme.title: Klute
programme.desc: A private detective investigates the disappearance of a scientist in New York, but finds his only lead is a prostitute with a tenuous connection to the missing man - and his attempts to gain her help are soon hampered by shadowy figures intent on silencing her. Alan J Pakula's thriller, starring Donald Sutherland, Roy Scheider and an Oscar-winning Jane Fonda.(n)

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: A college undergraduate training for a marathon is drawn into a shady world of espionage by his secret agent brother and a Nazi war criminal searching for a cache of stolen diamonds - entangling the student in a plot involving kidnap, torture and political intrigue. John Schlesinger's thriller, starring Dustin Hoffman, Laurence Olivier and Roy Scheider. Based on the novel by William Goldman.(n)

programme.title: How to Marry a Millionaire
programme.desc: Three women rent a luxurious New York apartment as part of a scheme to get their claws into wealthy husbands - but their plans become unstuck when all three start to fall for men with good hearts and empty pockets. Comedy, starring Betty Grable, Marilyn Monroe, Lauren Bacall, William Powell, Cameron Mitchell, David Wayne, Rory Calhoun and Fred Clark.(n)

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward teenager shuns all kinds of social interaction, apart from making films with his best friend. His well-meaning mother urges him to spend time with a girl who has been diagnosed with leukaemia, and they unexpectedly develop a firm friendship. However, his life is changed forever as her condition gets worse. Comedy drama based on Jesse Andrews' novel, starring Thomas Mann, RJ Cyler and Olivia Cooke.(n)

programme.title: Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus
programme.desc: Fictionalised biopic imagining the events that inspired the photographer's unusual art. Bored with her marriage and work as her husband's assistant on fashion shoots, she becomes fascinated with her mysterious neighbour, a former sideshow performer who has excessive body hair. Starring Nicole Kidman, Robert Downey Jr and Ty Burrell.(n)

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: The highly strung producer of a Washington news bureau falls for a handsome but arrogant and totally untalented new anchorman, but is unaware a humble reporter friend is deeply infatuated with her. Comedy, starring Holly Hunter, William Hurt and Albert Brooks. Featuring an uncredited cameo from Jack Nicholson.(n)

programme.title: Theeb
programme.desc: A Bedouin boy living in an Ottoman province during the First World War offers to help his brother guide a British officer on a perilous journey through the desert to a secret destination. He gradually becomes more aware of the devastating events occurring in the world around him and is forced to grow up quickly. Drama, starring Jacir Eid Al-Hwietat and Jack Fox. In Arabic.(n)

programme.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
programme.desc: Lounge singers Lorelei and Dorothy embark on a transatlantic cruise to Paris in search of rich husbands. While Dorothy falls for a penniless man, Lorelei thinks she has found the millionaire of her dreams, only for his father to hire a private eye to spy on her and prove she is a gold-digger. Howard Hawks' musical comedy, starring Marilyn Monroe, Jane Russell, Charles Coburn and Elliott Reid.(n)

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A teenager in 1960s London is unhappy with his lot in life, but believes he has found a place to belong in the mod subculture and their feud with the rival rockers. As the mods gather in Brighton for a weekend that turns to violence, his naive vision of the world is cruelly shattered. Drama based on the Who album, starring Phil Daniels, Leslie Ash, Sting and Ray Winstone.(n)

programme.title: The Machinist
programme.desc: A factory worker suffering from chronic insomnia has not slept properly in more than a year. When his extreme fatigue results in a tragic accident, his colleagues turn on him and he sinks into a state of intense paranoia, becoming obsessed with a man nobody else believes exists. Psychological thriller, starring Christian Bale, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Michael Ironside.(n)

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward teenager shuns all kinds of social interaction, apart from making films with his best friend. His well-meaning mother urges him to spend time with a girl who has been diagnosed with leukaemia, and they unexpectedly develop a firm friendship. However, his life is changed forever as her condition gets worse. Comedy drama based on Jesse Andrews' novel, starring Thomas Mann, RJ Cyler and Olivia Cooke.(n)

programme.title: Dope
programme.desc: A geeky teenager in an inner-city neighbourhood harbours dreams of going to Harvard. He and his friends think their social standing at school is set to improve when they get an invitation to an underground party, but the night leaves them mixed up in crime and drugs and forced to grow up fast. Crime comedy, starring Shameik Moore and Tony Revolori.(n)

programme.title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
programme.desc: A Confederate soldier refuses to surrender at the end of the Civil War, and is branded a dangerous outlaw. Crossing America in search of sanctuary from the army and bounty hunters, he only wants solitude - but ends up with a strange assortment of travelling companions. Western, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood. With Chief Dan George and Sondra Locke.(n)

programme.title: Tyrannosaur
programme.desc: An alcoholic unable to control his violent temper is struck when a charity shop worker responds to his verbal abuse with forgiveness. As they become friends, he learns she is trapped in an abusive marriage and takes her in when she runs away. However, his destructive urges continue to plague him. Drama, starring Peter Mullan, Olivia Colman and Eddie Marsan.

programme.title: New in Town
programme.desc: A Miami business executive accepts a temporary assignment helping to downsize a manufacturing plant in a small Minnesota town. Despite a frosty reception, she soon finds herself warming to the community and falling in love with the man of her dreams - until she is asked to do the unthinkable. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Harry Connick Jr and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Horton Hears a Who
programme.desc: A kindly elephant hears a cry of help coming from a speck of dust and discovers the minuscule city of Whoville. As he tries to help its citizens, the other animals begin to question his sanity, and the evil Kangaroo incites them to turn against the do-gooder. Animated adaptation of Dr Seuss's book, with the voices of Jim Carrey, Steve Carell, Carol Burnett, Seth Rogen and Will Arnett.

programme.title: Step Up 3
programme.desc: A student who has given up his dreams of being a dancer in favour of his education meets a team of street dancers fallen on hard times. He is recruited into the group as they compete in a high-stakes tournament to win the money they need to secure rehearsal space. Dance drama sequel, starring Rick Malambri, Adam G Sevani and Sharni Vinson.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent retires to a Tibetan monastery in disgrace after a mission goes wrong. He is lured out of seclusion by the chance to redeem himself when his former bosses seek his help in foiling an attempt to assassinate the premier of China. Spy comedy sequel, starring Rowan Atkinson, Gillian Anderson, Rosamund Pike and Dominic West.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: A single man gets the chance to turn his unhappy life around when his father reveals that they both have the ability to travel through time and change their personal history. He uses his newfound talent to try to improve his love life and win the heart of an American woman he has fallen for. Romantic fantasy comedy, with Domhnall Gleeson, Rachel McAdams and Bill Nighy.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: A former US government operative battling with alcoholism is hired as a bodyguard to the daughter of a wealthy businessman in Mexico City - but when the girl is abducted, he swears to exact an explosive revenge on the kidnappers. Action thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Christopher Walken, Radha Mitchell and Dakota Fanning.

programme.title: Land of Silence and Darkness
programme.desc: Werner Herzog's documentary examining the life of Fini Straubinger, a woman who lost both her sight and her hearing during her teens. The film examines how she has dedicated her life to helping other deaf and blind people, and examines the ways in which they perceive the world with their other senses. In German.(n)

programme.title: The Bandit of Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: The son of Robin Hood reunites his father's merry men to carry out a rescue mission at the request of the Queen Mother. The rightful king of England is being held captive by a cruel lord, who intends to seize the throne himself and repeal the freedoms the English people have been granted under Magna Carta. Swashbuckling adventure, starring Cornel Wilde and Anita Louise.(n)

programme.title: Time Bandits
programme.desc: A bemused schoolboy is escorted on a bizarre journey through time by a group of larcenous dwarfs. His adventures lead him to encounters with various characters from history - but none of them are quite what he had imagined. Terry Gilliam's fantasy comedy, starring Craig Warnock, David Rappaport, John Cleese, Michael Palin, Sean Connery, Ian Holm, Ralph Richardson and David Warner.(n)

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: A paranormal expert moves into a haunted house where his daughter befriends the amiable ghost of a young boy - but things start to go awry when three smelly spooks and two dastardly crooks try to chase the new residents away. Family comedy, starring Christina Ricci, Bill Pullman, Eric Idle, Cathy Moriarty and featuring the voice of Malachi Pearson.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Mr Fox
programme.desc: A rebellious fox decides it is time to grow up and change his chicken-stealing ways for the sake of his wife and children. However, the presence of three wicked farmers near his woodland home proves a challenge he cannot resist. Stop-motion animated adventure based on the novel by Roald Dahl, with the voices of George Clooney, Meryl Streep, Jason Schwartzman and Bill Murray.(n)

programme.title: GI Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: When a powerful experimental weapon is snatched by a mysterious terrorist organisation, two of the soldiers guarding it are recruited into a top-secret military strike force. As they go in search of the stolen technology, they uncover a plot by its creator to take over the world. Action adventure, with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston.(n)

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: A fugitive is left for dead by his treacherous followers on a dangerous world full of lethal predators. He lures bounty hunters to the planet in the hope of killing them and stealing their spacecraft, but finds himself forced to work with them against an attack by the monsters at the top of the food chain. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel and Katee Sackhoff.(n)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
programme.desc: Criminals hijack a crowded New York subway train and threaten to start shooting the passengers unless a $10million ransom is paid in one hour. However, the transport supervisor they issue their demands to begins to suspect the plot is part of an even grander scheme. Tony Scott's thriller remake, with Denzel Washington and John Travolta.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob meets an old girlfriend who claims to be pregnant with his child, while Ben stands up to the guards in the PoW camp.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben's captor allows him to return to the American forces, Jason cannot commit to Toni, and Drew is turned down for military service.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger arrives in town, planning to stay in a burnt-out house, and encounters nothing but hostility from the locals, even though she is friendly toward Laura and her pals.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles and Mary embark on a disappointing trip to Chicago, where romantic problems and union officials spoil their enjoyment.

programme.title: Hotel Meina
programme.desc: The guests at a Jewish-owned hotel outside Milan believe the Second World War is coming to an end when they receive news of Mussolini being overthrown. However, the property is seized by German forces, with Jewish guests and staff held prisoner and ultimately killed, bringing the Nazi genocide to Italy for the first time. Fact-based drama, starring Benjamin Sadler and Federico Costantini. In Italian.

programme.title: Santa Jr
programme.desc: Father Christmas's ne'er-do-well son decides to prove he can follow in his father's footsteps and goes out delivering presents. However, his good deed coincides with a spate of burglaries, and he ends up being arrested for the crimes. Comedy, starring Nick Stabile, Judd Nelson, Lauren Holly and George Wallace.

programme.title: Playing for Time
programme.desc: A French Jewish cabaret singer is captured by the Nazis during the Second World War and sent to Auschwitz. She is forced to join a group of musicians who are spared the gas chambers in return for performing for the guards, but finds her survival still comes at great psychological cost. Fact-based drama, starring Vanessa Redgrave and Jane Alexander.

programme.title: Princess Diana: In Search of Happiness
programme.desc: A review of the life of Diana, Princess of Wales, including her childhood, her move into the public eye, her work for charity, her marriage and her death.

programme.title: Borrowed Hearts
programme.desc: A ruthless factory boss pays a hard-up employee to pose as his wife, hoping to impress a mysterious colleague - an arrangement with unexpected consequences for all concerned. Romantic drama, starring Roma Downey, Eric McCormack and Shawn Thompson.

programme.title: Small Town Santa
programme.desc: A sheriff loses his festive spirit, but his world is turned upside down when he arrests an intruder claiming to be Santa on Christmas Eve. Comedy, starring Dean Cain, Christine Lakin and Derek Brandon.

programme.title: Prancer Returns
programme.desc: A youngster moves to a new area, but has trouble settling in, especially when the local bullies set their sights on him. However, his luck seems to take a turn for the better when he discovers a sweet little reindeer in the snow and vows to take care of it - only to have a battle on his hands when locals find out about the cute creature. Festive fantasy adventure, starring Gavin Fink, Stacy Edwards, John Corbett and Jack Palance.

programme.title: Hearts Adrift
programme.desc: A mother and daughter's humdrum small-town life is radically changed by a trip to spend a weekend with a family friend in the country. Romantic drama, starring Sydney Penny, Scott Reeves, Kathleen Noone and Nicolas Coster.

programme.title: Deacons for Defence
programme.desc: A black man is pushed too far by the racist abuse and unprovoked violent assaults meted out by white bigots in the 1960s, and organises a defence group to fight back. Fact-based drama, starring Forest Whitaker, Adam Weiner, Jonathan Silverman and Serene Lee.

programme.title: In the Line of Duty: Street War
programme.desc: A cop is left devastated and grief-stricken after his partner is murdered in cold blood - and sets out to exact revenge on the villains responsible for the crime. Thriller, starring Ray Sharkey, Peter Boyle and Courtney B Vance.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben returns home with plans for the future, Cindy receives a visit from her father, and John has bad news about Olivia.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen accepts Jonesy's marriage proposal, but regrets her choice when she discovers Curt may still be alive. Jason reopens the inn.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: When the Ingalls girls go swimming, their friend Ellen Taylor gets trapped underwater and drowns, and her grief-stricken mother begins to imagine that Laura is Ellen.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary mistakenly jumps to the conclusion that her mother has fallen for Chris, the handsome handyman they have hired to finish work on the house.(n)

programme.title: A Holiday to Remember
programme.desc: A single mum returns to her childhood home where she intends to escape from the pressures of life in Los Angeles - until an old boyfriend persuades her to rekindle the flames of their passion. Romantic drama, with Connie Sellecca, Randy Travis, Asia Vieria and Rue McClanahan.(n)

programme.title: Going for the Gold: The Bill Johnson Story
programme.desc: Biopic of the downhill skier who went from juvenile delinquent to Olympic champion. However, his rebellious attitude and rebellious nature towards authority almost cost him his opportunity at the 1984 event. Starring Anthony Edwards, Sarah Jessica Parker and Dennis Weaver.(n)

programme.title: For the Love of My Child: The Anissa Ayala Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a 16-year-old girl whose life is shattered when she is diagnosed as having leukaemia. Further stress is put on the family when her parents consider having another child in the hope of using its bone marrow in a life-saving transplant. Starring Priscilla Lopez, Tony Perez, Robin Thomas and Luis Ramos.(n)

programme.title: Sudden Fury
programme.desc: Three abused brothers are suspected of complicity in the murder of their callous adoptive parents. Fact-based drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Johnny Galecki, Gregory Harrison and Linda Kelsey.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Box
programme.desc: A hard-working man's obsession with his business causes him to neglect his family - but a series of strange dreams makes him realise it is the most important thing in his life. Drama, starring Richard Thomas and Maureen O'Hara.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Christmas
programme.desc: An FBI agent reluctantly agrees to keep a close eye on a waitress who put herself in the firing line when she spoke up about her boyfriend's criminal activities. However, the witness protection job takes a turn for the unexpected when the lawman has to return to his hometown for Christmas - dragging the damsel in distress with him. Romantic comedy, starring Jami Gertz, Shawn Christian and Tyne Daly.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Reunion
programme.desc: An orphan yearns to be closer to his ageing grandfather, and his wish is granted after a visit to Santa Claus reveals a few home truths. Drama, with Edward Woodward, James Coburn and Meredith Edwards.(n)

programme.title: Stolen Innocence
programme.desc: An unhappy, emotionally vulnerable teenager runs away from home and falls for a charismatic ex-convict, joining him as he travels the country on a crime spree. However, her psychopathic companion ultimately takes her hostage, so he can demand a ransom from her parents. Drama, starring Tracey Gold, Thomas Calabro, Bess Armstrong and Nick Searcy.(n)

programme.title: Breach of Trust
programme.desc: A woman is devastated to learn a plane on which her husband was travelling has crashed, leaving him in a coma. However, the disaster leads to the revelation that he has been conducting a secret relationship with another woman, who did not survive the crash. What's more, they had a daughter. Drama, starring Roma Downey, William Russ and Jamie Rose.(n)

programme.title: In the Best Interest of the Children
programme.desc: A manic depressive woman is released from an institution and tries to regain custody of her five children. However, their foster parents wish to officially adopt them, and her eldest daughter believes that would be for the best. As a bitter legal battle ensues, the mother's mental health begins to deteriorate once more. Fact-based drama, starring Sarah Jessica Parker and Sally Struthers.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan meets a fellow angel who has been on probation for 200 years, and cannot stop himself breaking the rules when he should be spreading happiness. Edward Asner guest stars.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A man tries to persuade his neighbours to help him build a memorial to his son, who was killed in the Vietnam war. Eli Wallach guest stars.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt finds an orphan lost on the prairie, and takes her to live with her only relative - an aunt who does not want her.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Jed Hockett prepares for the wedding of his sons to the women they kidnapped - but the boys struggle with married life. Guest starring Harry Morgan (MASH) and William Katt (Carrie).

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: A man is arrested in a sting operation for bribery, but since he has a heart condition he is taken to a hospital. Tess and Monica pose as nurses as he has a heart transplant. The man sees Andrew and knows who he is, but not how to re-act. Drama, starring Roma Downey and Della Reese.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Part one of two. The angels help a young drug addict get her life back on track. Roma Downey and Della Reese star.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A movie is being filmed in town. John-Boy offers to changed the dialogue to make it more authentic - which results in the writer, who is an old friend, getting fired.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A cousin of the family arrives with her baby, having left her husband whom she believes is being unfaithful.

programme.title: In the Line of Duty: The Price of Vengeance
programme.desc: A tough-talking hitman sets out to bump off a quartet of local businessman who stand in his way - but he decides to do away with a hard-nosed cop into the bargain, a decision that makes him the target of a furious vendetta. Crime thriller, starring Dean Stockwell, Michael Gross and Brent Jennings.

programme.title: First Do No Harm
programme.desc: A woman decides to seek alternative forms of treatment for her epileptic son after the conventional methods employed by his doctors fail to have an impact on his welbeing. However, she encounters resistance from members of the medical establishment, who seek to take legal action to stop her removing her child from the hospital. Drama, based on a true story, starring Meryl Streep.

programme.title: Have You Seen My Son
programme.desc: A woman strives to find her sick son after he is kidnapped by her ex-husband. Drama, starring Lisa Hartman Black, William Russ, Jameson Parker, Anne Francis and Scott Hylands.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia thinks John works too hard and tries to persuade him to take some time off, but then receives disturbing news about her own health.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: If I Should Wake Before I Die.
programme.desc: Amy decides to fake her own death to trick her estranged family into coming to town.

programme.title: Deep in My Heart
programme.desc: A white woman gives birth to a black baby following a sexual assault and resolves to give it away to foster care. However, after initially being placed in a loving home, the child is sent to live with a well-meaning but unsuitable family. Fact-based drama, starring Anne Bancroft, Lynn Whitfield, Alice Krige and Cara Buono.

programme.title: A Family in Crisis: The Elian Gonzales Story
programme.desc: A five-year-old Cuban refugee is rescued from a disaster at sea and taken to America - where he finds himself a political pawn as relatives and two national governments haggle over his future in a headline-grabbing case. Fact-based drama, starring Esai Morales, Alec Roberts and Alan Rachins.

programme.title: The Road from Coorain
programme.desc: Biopic of Australian feminist writer Jill Ker Conway, charting her upbringing in a farming community and early experience of the academic world. Starring Juliet Stevenson and Richard Roxburgh.

programme.title: Taming Andrew
programme.desc: A mother is distraught when her son is abducted and spends the next five years searching for him, only to suffer more pain when they are finally reunited and she discovers the emotional trauma he has endured. Fact-based drama, starring Park Overall, Jason Beghe and Seth Adkins.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Mark believes he is responsible for two tragedies, and pleads with Jonathan to change history.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan reunites a woman with the son she was forced to abandon in Russia during the Second World War - but he questions the angel's motives for wanting to help them.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt is falsely convicted of murder and given a life sentence of hard labour.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A preacher's plan to build a church for Native Americans proves controversial, and Festus is caught up in the ensuing conflict.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Part two of two. The angels continue to help a drug addict get back on track. Roma Downey stars.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica poses as a TV weathergirl to keep an eye on a hard-edged reporter. Drama, starring Roma Downey.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen needs help studying for her medical training, so offers to help a nurse as she treats a dying woman.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben decides to assert his independence, but finds the only job he can get is working for his father's rival.(n)

programme.title: Jack Reed: One of Our Own
programme.desc: The maverick detective's partner is murdered by a hitman they were investigating and he sets out to bring him to justice with the help of the killer's girlfriend. Thriller, directed by and starring Brian Dennehy. With Susan Ruttan, Charles Dutton and CCH Pounder.(n)

programme.title: Prophet of Evil: The Ervil LeBaron Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, about religious fanatic Ervil LeBaron, who believed he had God's permission to kill anyone standing in the way of his drive for wealth and power. Starring Brian Dennehy, Tracy Needham and William Devane.(n)

programme.title: Video Voyeur: The Susan Wilson Story
programme.desc: A woman is understandably horrified to discover her apparently kind-hearted neighbour has somehow managed to install state-of-the-art surveillance equipment throughout her home, so he can spy on her and her family. Fact-based drama, starring Angie Harmon, Jamey Sheridan and Dale Midkiff.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A stroke of luck saves Jim Bob from certain disaster, and prompts a major change in his outlook on life.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura befriends a girl with a deformed leg, but when Charles offers to help the youngster walk more easily, her father objects.(n)

programme.title: Unabomber: The True Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama following the life of Ted Kaczynski, one of America's most notorious terrorists, who carried out a campaign of bombings between 1978 and 1995, and threatened further violence unless his political manifesto was published. However, his own brother would prove instrumental in bringing him to justice. Starring Robert Hays, Dean Stockwell and Tobin Bell.(n)

programme.title: In the Arms of a Killer
programme.desc: A rookie homicide cop lands herself in a dilemma after making the foolish mistake of becoming romantically involved with the prime suspect in a drug-related murder case. Thriller, starring Jaclyn Smith, John Spencer, Michael Nouri, Nina Foch and Sandahl Bergman.(n)

programme.title: To Live For
programme.desc: A terminally ill woman's last months are made happier by her relationship with a stranger she hopes will take care of her children. Romantic drama, starring Nancy Travis, Scott Bairstow, Jamie Renee Smith, Karen James and Viveka Davis.(n)

programme.title: Her Desperate Choice
programme.desc: A woman flees the authorities in an attempt to protect her daughter from the child's paedophile father and seeks the help of an underground organisation dedicated to protecting abused youngsters. Drama, with Kyle Secor, Faith Ford, Hanna R Hall and Nigel Bennett.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Beautiful
programme.desc: When the head of the Russian mob arrives to find out what really happened to Belikov, Sonia and her daughter take refuge at the Donovan's, throwing her and Abby into close quarters. As both Avi and Lena question Ray's loyalty to Sonia, he must decide whether to help her or put the lives of his family and friends in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Mickey returns to Primm - in search of stolen money, Sylvie and vengeance

programme.title: The Corporate Gig
programme.desc: The Staton-House Band's first-ever corporate gig sets the crew loose at a beachfront resort in San Diego, as several relationships take unexpected turns

Stars Taye Diggs and Nia Long

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Writer and director Quentin Tarantino reinvigorated the noir crime drama with this wildly entertaining blockbuster that casts John Travolta and Samuel L. Jackson as hit-man partners whose meandering paths cross those of a powerful gangster (Ving Rhames), the latter's overdosing girlfriend (Uma Thurman), a desperate boxer (Bruce Willis) and a pair of stickup artists named Honeybunny (Amanda Plummer) and Pumpkin (Tim Roth). "Leaves viewers both exhilarated and exhausted - hearts racing and knuckles white from the ride." -Amazon.com

programme.title: Bella
programme.desc: An international soccer star is on his way to sign a multimillion-dollar contract when a series of events unfold that bring his career to an abrupt end, and when his life intersects with a waitress struggling to make it in New York, both of their lives change irrevocably, turning one ordinary day into an unforgettable experience

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award� winner Helen Mirren

programme.title: Mississippi Burning
programme.desc: Gene Hackman and Willem Dafoe star as FBI agents with wildly different styles who arrive in 1960s Mississippi to investigate the murder of civil rights activists and become embroiled in a dangerous conspiracy of silence

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx stars as the American legend Ray Charles in this musical drama that is an unflinching portrait of the soulful singer's battle to overcome addiction, fight segregation and revolutionize the music as he transformed into one of the country's most beloved performers. Also stars Kerry Washington

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver

With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: The Hand That Rocks The Cradle
programme.desc: A live-in nanny (Rebecca De Mornay) with a frightening hidden agenda becomes trouble for her employers (Annabella Sciorra and Matt McCoy) when a seething vendetta explodes into homicidal rage in this well-crafted thriller, a box office smash(n)

programme.title: Things You Can Tell Just By Looking At Her
programme.desc: Glenn Close, Holly Hunter, Cameron Diaz, Calista Flockhart, Kathy Baker and Amy Brenneman star in Rodrigo Garcia's debut feature, composed of five narratives which examine the hidden emotional lives of women in contemporary Los Angeles. An unmarried bank manager faces the possibility of an abortion; a police detective discovers her blind sister's astute insight; a lonely gynecologist consults a psychic; a lesbian couple confronts the finality of their relationship; and a single mother becomes erotically intrigued by a dwarf next door(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Why Did I Get Married?
programme.desc: A therapeutic retreat to a bucolic Colorado setting for couples that are seeking to mend their marriages turns into a full-blown crisis when one participant shows up with a sexy temptress in tow. Writer, director and actor Tyler Perry stars with Janet Jackson in this domestic comedy-drama, with Jill Scott, Malik Yoba, Richard T. Jones and Michael Jai White(n)

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship(n)

programme.title: Miles To Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Short documentary chronicling the true story of famed musicians and the relationships they have with their roadies. programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: A newspaper cartoonist becomes obsessed with solving San Francisco's infamous "Zodiac" serial killer case, and eventually closes in on a suspect after the case has long become cold in this fact-based thriller starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Mark Ruffalo, Robert Downey Jr. and Chloe Sevigny(n)

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: The saga of James Bond, agent 007 of Her Majesty's Secret Service, is given a fresh injection of high-octane thrills with this reboot of the spy series starring Daniel Craig as a newly minted, wet-nosed "blunt instrument" assigned his first mission: take down the sinister La Chiffre, an international arms dealer selling dangerous weapons to terrorists. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise(n)

programme.title: The Abandoned
programme.desc: This eerie, artful horror phantasm stars Anastasia Hille as a film producer who unexpectedly receives a farmhouse inheritance in her native Russia - a mysterious, island-bound structure that houses many ghostly secrets about her unknown past. Karel Roden costars in this effective, chilling genre picture cowritten and directed by Nacho Cerda

programme.title: Angels of Darkness
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a woman and her estranged father who go behind the Iron Curtain to a small Hungarian town where strange events unfold. From withering crops to dying farm animals and the local young women going mad -- they must find out if there's a darker secret behind the mass hysteria destroying the town. Stars Stephen Rea

programme.title: Anarchy Parlor
programme.desc: Horror about a mysterious nomad who works at a Lithuanian tattoo parlor where he practices a dark art form passed down through the generations, giving the visiting tourists much more than they bargained for

programme.title: Let Us Prey
programme.desc: A rookie cop in a remote Scottish police station encounters a supernatural force that takes over the minds and souls of the cops and crooks, forcing them to fight for their lives against an unholy power

programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Mockumentary horror set in a 1960s paranormal research institute, where a new female subject displays demonic prowess. But when the US government steps in to weaponize her abilities, there are disastrous consequences

Jonathan Cherry, Tyron Leitso, Clint Howard, Ona Grauer, Ellie Cornell, William Sanderson and Jurgen Prochnow star in this film from director Uwe Boll(n)

Ashley Judd, Michael Shannon and Harry Connick Jr. star in this taut thriller from director William Friedkin, based on the play by Tracy Letts(n)

programme.desc: When a struggling artist finds his muse in a sultry singer at an underground nightclub, their daring romance spirals out of control into a dangerous game of deception and betrayal(n)

Simply known as Mister, the vampire stalker takes Martin on a journey through the locked-down towns of America's heartland, searching for a better place to call home while taking down any bloodsuckers that cross their path(n)

programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Jonah Hill and Alan Arkin(c)

programme.desc: Demi Moore stars in this romantic fantasy as two very different women who seem to be the same person in two different places, France and New York. William Fichtner, Joss Ackland, Peter Riegert and Stellan Skarsgard costar in this moving, memorable film from French director Alain Berliner ("Ma Vie en Rose")

programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes

programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: Ask Me Anything
programme.desc: A beautiful and lost young woman takes a year off before college to find herself, and chronicles her life in an anonymous blog, but as she becomes embroiled further in a series of sexual and romantic misadventures, her fearless narrative begins to crack

programme.desc: Documentary reliving National Lampoon's meteoric rise from the go-to humor magazine of the counterculture to a brand that launched Hollywood's biggest comedies, featuring unseen archival footage, beautiful and shocking art, interviews with the magazine's best-known artists and writers and commentary from Judd Apatow, John Goodman, Billy Bob Thornton, Christopher Buckley and Chevy Chase(n)

programme.title: Margaret Cho: psyCHO
programme.desc: Three-time Grammy� and Emmy� nominated comedian Margaret Cho performs in front of a live audience in this provocative and hilarious comedy special event, tackling off-limits issues from Boko Haram to female empowerment with her razor sharp insight and wit(n)

programme.title: Tooken
programme.desc: In this spoof of the 'Taken' action-film franchise, an ex-CIA agent is now working as a mall security guard who keeps finding his things are being taken from him, including his wife, his dog and his daughter's virginity. With the help of his elderly mother, he must battle his nemesis to free his family. Stars Margaret Cho(n)

programme.title: The Dramatics (A Comedy)
programme.desc: When an out-of-work actress unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation of a best-selling erotic novel, her aimless, stoner boyfriend does his best to be supportive. But when her volatile, Oscar� winning co-lead takes "rehearsals" too far, her dream job becomes her boyfriend's worst nightmare and the couple is forced to decide whether or not their relationship is worth fighting for. Stars Pablo Schreiber(n)

programme.title: Safelight
programme.desc: A high-school student tries to help a troubled runaway escape from the clutches of her psychotic pimp by taking a road trip along the California coastline. Stars Juno Temple and Evan Peters(n)

programme.title: Lost in the Sun
programme.desc: A small time criminal past finds an unlikely accomplice in a newly orphaned teenage boy, conning him into a dangerous cross country trip where they undertake a series of robberies and hope the past won't catch up with them(n)

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book(n)

programme.desc: In the wake of a cataclysmic event where the dead rose again, a young boy lives in a strangely idyllic small town world akin to the 1950s, where zombies have been domesticated. But when he finds a new best friend in his zombie servant, he learns what it really means to be alive(n)

programme.title: Beautiful Girls
programme.desc: During a visit to his Massachusetts home town, a professional piano player (Timothy Hutton) gets involved with both a sexy fellow visitor (Uma Thurman) and the alluring teenager (Natalie Portman) now living next door to his childhood home. Also stars Matt Dillon, Rosie O'Donnel and Mira Sorvino(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Jaden Smith star in this family martial arts adventure, a remake of the 1984 hit starring Ralph Macchio and Pat Morita. The film is produced by the young co-lead's parents, with the action moving from America to China, and the karate consequently replaced by kung fu. After the death of his father, Dre Parker's mother Sherry takes up a job offer in Beijing, where the 11-year-old is enrolled in a local school. Sadly, it's not long before the lad falls foul of the inevitable bullies. But he's saved from a beating by the kindly caretaker Mr Han, who uses his considerable prowess to turn Dre's attackers' moves against them, to humiliating effect. Following this incident, the quiet martial arts master reluctantly agrees to teach the American child how to look after himself, starting a journey that is set to culminate in Dre's participation in a major kung fu tournament - and his chance to turn the tables on his former assailants

programme.desc: James Marsh's biopic of the celebrated scientist Stephen Hawking, The Theory of Everything, stars Eddie Redmayne as the famous figure. Enrolled as a graduate student at Cambridge, Hawking establishes himself as one of the leading minds of his generation, and begins to win the heart of Jane (Felicity Jones). After one of his earliest breakthroughs, Hawking is diagnosed with ALS, and he becomes less and less able to control his own body. With the loyal Jane at his side, he continues his work. However, as the years progress, Jane starts to feel more like a nurse than a wife, and Hawking begins to have feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him. The Theory of Everything screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: When a teenage girl is faced with an unexpected pregnancy, she enlists the aid of her best friend in finding the unborn child a suitable home in this coming-of-age comedy drama from Thank You for Smoking director Jason Reitman. Juno (Ellen Page) may seem wise beyond her years, but after sleeping with classmate Bleeker (Michael Cera), the pregnant teen quickly realizes how little she really knows about life. Thankfully, Juno has been blessed with parents (J.K. Simmons and Allison Janney) who trust their daughter's judgment, and a best friend named Leah (Olivia Thirlby), who's always willing to help out in a pinch. With a little help from Leah, Juno soon comes into contact with Mark (Jason Bateman) and Vanessa (Jennifer Garner) -- an affluent suburban couple who have been unable to conceive a child of their own. Mark and Vanessa seem like they would make great parents, and are eager to adopt Juno's unborn child. Now, as adolescent Juno is faced with a series of very adult decisions, she will draw on the support of her family and friends in order to discover who she truly is, and discover that one bad choice can have a lifetime of consequences

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2

programme.title: Making of 'Pitch Perfect 2'
programme.desc: A look at "Pitch Perfect 2," a 2015 musical comedy about a collegiate a cappella group that enters an international competition no U.S. team has ever won. The sequel to the 2012 film stars Anna Kendrick, Skylar Astin and Rebel Wilson, and is directed by Elizabeth Banks

programme.title: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar

programme.title: Georgia Rule
programme.desc: Jane Fonda, Felicity Huffman, and Lindsay Lohan star in director Garry Marshall's tale of a rebellious young woman who is sent to spend the summer with her grandmother when her frustrated mother fails to find a means of curbing her unruly behavior. Rachel (Lohan) is an out-of-control teen whose reckless drinking, foul mouth, and hysterical fits have become a constant source of embarrassment for her long-suffering mother, Lily (Huffman). When Rachel crashes her car, Lily determines that the only way to tame her savage daughter is to take her as far away from San Francisco as possible. Though Lily had once sworn never to return to the Idaho farm presided over by her demanding mother, Georgia (Jane Fonda), desperation has a funny way of dulling the pains of the past, and it's not long before Lily is packing Rachel in the car and setting out for potato country. Contrary to the common image of the sweet and doting grandmother, Georgia is a stern matriarch whose beliefs in the power of God and a hard day's work stand in stark contrast to the carefree lifestyle of the tempestuous Rachel. An interesting thing happens as the summer wears on, though; despite her initial efforts to disrupt the quiet Mormon community, Rachel's rage is gradually tempered as she learns the value of structure and responsibility. Later, as Rachel's protective walls begin to crumble and she begins to embrace compassion and kindness, the doors are opened for three generations of family to confront the long-buried secrets of their past and finally move forward in the healing process

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: In this amusing fish-out-of-water workplace comedy, a 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy start-up fashion company. Later, he unexpectedly becomes a confidant for the overwhelmed young CEO

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: When a teenage girl is faced with an unexpected pregnancy, she enlists the aid of her best friend in finding the unborn child a suitable home in this coming-of-age comedy drama from Thank You for Smoking director Jason Reitman. Juno (Ellen Page) may seem wise beyond her years, but after sleeping with classmate Bleeker (Michael Cera), the pregnant teen quickly realizes how little she really knows about life. Thankfully, Juno has been blessed with parents (J.K. Simmons and Allison Janney) who trust their daughter's judgment, and a best friend named Leah (Olivia Thirlby), who's always willing to help out in a pinch. With a little help from Leah, Juno soon comes into contact with Mark (Jason Bateman) and Vanessa (Jennifer Garner) -- an affluent suburban couple who have been unable to conceive a child of their own. Mark and Vanessa seem like they would make great parents, and are eager to adopt Juno's unborn child. Now, as adolescent Juno is faced with a series of very adult decisions, she will draw on the support of her family and friends in order to discover who she truly is, and discover that one bad choice can have a lifetime of consequences

programme.title: Standing Still
programme.desc: When a diverse group of lifelong friends comes together to celebrate the marriage of devoted couple Elise (Amy Adams) and Michael (Adam Garcia), the mixed-up relationships of the past pave the road to a weekend no one is likely to soon forget in the feature debut from filmmaker Matthew Cole Weiss. The setting is Los Angeles, CA, and the event is the wedding between a man and a woman who always seemed destined to be together. Unfortunately, all relationships can't be as healthy as Elise and Michael's is, and though best man and maid of honor Rich (Aaron Stanford) and Samantha (Melissa Sagemiller) seem to be preparing to take the plunge, the same certainly cannot be said for neurotic actress Lana (Mena Suvari). A free-spirited soul who has experienced flings with a variety of wedding attendees including the hapless Pockets (Jon Abrahams), alcoholic actor Simon (James Van Der Beek), and manic children's television program host Donovan (Ethan Embry), Lana attempts to sort out her past flings as lovelorn agent Quentin (Colin Hanks) pines for the bride's sister and the estranged father of the groom attempts to reconnect with his long-lost son

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: The Barden Bellas are back, determined to enter (and win) an international competition - one that has never had an American winner. After a disasterous performance elsewhere, the Bellas have much more to prove if they want to become the best!

programme.title: National Lampoon's Van Wilder
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds is the eponymous hero in Walter Becker's comedy, now in his seventh year at college whose mission in life is to help all the undergrads have a good time (and in the case of the girls, join him in bed). Then his father withdraws his funding and our hero is forced to earn his money organising pay parties. So successful are they, the college paper gets interested and if his secret gets out, he'll be expelled. Can he persuade reporter Tara Reid that what he does serves a useful purpose on campus?(n)

programme.title: The Fabulous Baker Boys
programme.desc: Piano-playing brothers, one a prodigy, the other mediocre, meet a chanteuse who livens up their act but whose affair with one may break them up(n)

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin inherited his Chicago barbershop from his dad, but now he's sold it to loanshark Lester. Hearing that the crook plans to turn it into a nightclub, Calvin resolves to get his salon back. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Thunderstruck
programme.desc: A teenage basketball fan inadvertently steals his NBA idol's talent in this sports comedy for the entire family. Brian loves basketball. He can't make a free shot to save his life, but he dreams of the day when he'll learn to dunk like basketball superstar Kevin Durant. Then, one night at an NBA game, Brian is called down to the boards to make a half-court shot, and something magical happens. The moment Kevin hands Brian the ball, his dazzling skills are transferred to the bumbling young fan. Now Brian can play ball like pro, and Kevin can barely dribble. With the championship game fast approaching and Kevin's career on the line, young Brian must figure out a way to get his sports hero back in the action, even if it means giving up the ability to outplay everyone on the court(n)

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: A real-estate agent's family is stuck in a creepy old house crawling with ghosts(n)

programme.title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Sonny (Dev Patel) prepares to expand the Best Exotic Marigold Hotel for the Elderly and Beautiful while planning his impending wedding to Sunaina (Tena Desae) in this sequel that reteams director John Madden and screenwriter Ol Parker. As the contented residents of the hotel begin settling into their new lives, Sonny strives to balance the demands of planning his wedding with the responsibilities of purchasing a new property. Meanwhile, new guests Guy (Richard Gere) and Lavinia (Tamsin Greig) find themselves in a predicament after arriving at the hotel to find there is only one vacancy. Perhaps with a little innovation new co-manager Muriel (Maggie Smith) can find a means of accommodating the hotel's latest occupants, but she'll have her work cut out for her as Douglas (Bill Nighy) and Evelyn (Judi Dench) begin their new careers in Jaipur while flirting with the idea of a serious romance -- like Norman (Ronald Pickup) and Carol (Diana Hardcastle). With romance in the air it's no wonder that Madge (Celia Imrie) has her pick of handsome suitors, and as stalwart Muriel safeguards the many secrets of the vivacious residents, Sonny and Sunaina learn that planning a traditional Indian wedding can be a true test of commitment(n)

programme.title: D.C. Cab
programme.desc: In this casual, uninvolved comedy running on a low-octane script, a scruffy taxi company is about to be wiped out when its owner Harold (Max Gail) exhorts his cabbies to do what they can to help save the company -- and what they can do turns out to be a surprise to everyone concerned. Saving the day (and the film) are the likeable, eccentric drivers, introduced by means of a new trainee (Adam Baldwin) who rides around with each in turn(n)

programme.desc: Wendy Liebman. Comedienne Wendy Liebman takes on a variety of topics, including herself ("I'm very immature. That's what my pediatrician told me"); and driving ("My license plate says PMS-666---nobody cuts me off"). Taped in San Francisco(n)

programme.sub-title: All's Fare in Love and Vegas
programme.desc: All's Fare in Love and Vegas. Unsuspecting riders in Las Vegas taxis reveal intimate details of their lives to hidden cameras. Included: a dancer describes her experiences in explicit films; a DJ laments the state of modern music; a gay man discusses his boyfriend of 11 years; an incest victim relates her troubled history(n)

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: Nadia is coming back, and Jim has to sharpen up his bedroom act. Stifler tries to chat up the cuties next door, while Finchy still has designs on the rude boy's mum. Includes raunchy additional footage including several more minutes featuring Stifler's lesbian neighbours(n)

programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: A TV reporter sets out to change her ways after a homeless psychic tells her that she has only a week to live(n)

programme.title: Jonas Brothers: The Concert Experience
programme.desc: A 3-D concert film of the 2008 Jonas Brothers Burning Up concert tour, as well as documentary footage on the lives of the three brothers(n)

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: The directorial debut of Academy Award-winning actor Denzel Washington, Antwone Fisher is an autobiographical drama written by the real-life Antwone Fisher. Played by newcomer Derek Luke, Antwone is a volatile young sailor in the Navy, getting into trouble for his constant fighting. When he gets appointed to see naval psychiatrist Dr. Jerome Davenport (Denzel Washington), he begins to reveal the emotional problems behind his rage. Through an introduction to anger management, Antwone is able to confront some secrets of his past and eventually search out his family for a confrontation. Also starring model-turned-actress Joy Bryant as Antwone's girlfriend, Cheryl, and Salli Richardson as Davenport's wife. Antwone Fisher's memoir, Finding Fish, was released to book stores right before the film's theatrical release(n)

programme.title: The Forsaken
programme.desc: While driving from Los Angeles to Florida, a movie editor picks up two hitchhikers who've been bitten by vampires and are trying to hunt down their attackers(n)

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: A bouncer is hired in a rowdy bar where brawling is a nightly event, but his efforts to clean it up are stifled by a local crime boss(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal, revealing how he changed from a once idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage(n)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Exciting car chases and frenetic martial-arts action fortify this action-packed crime thriller from writer-producer Luc Besson. Jason Statham stars as Frank Martin, a deliveryman of illicit packages who gets mixed up in an Asian slave ring. Shu Qi, Matt Schulze, Ric Young, Francois Berleand(n)

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: In a sun-parched future, loner Max gets caught up in the exodus of a clan of rebels fleeing an evil despot as they race across the Wasteland(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: Adapted from the young adult novel by John Green, Fox 2000's Paper Towns tells the story of the bizarre mystery that unfolds in the wake of an acute youthful trauma. After stumbling across the body of a suicide victim, two young neighbors gradually begin to drift apart. Years later, the girl appears at the boy's window in a ninja costume, and requests his help in punishing those who were cruel to her. The following day she disappears without a trace, leaving him in a state of emotional flux as he follows a bizarre trail of clues in hopes of tracking her down(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal, revealing how he changed from a once idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage(n)

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her

programme.title: Iceman
programme.desc: A prehistoric hunter, discovered frozen in the Arctic, is revived by doctors. Some scientists want to dissect him but others hope to learn to communicate with him, and in so doing discover what life was truly like for our Neanderthal ancestors(r)

programme.title: Autumn in New York
programme.desc: An unlikely romance blossoms in the Big Apple between a womanizing playboy and a significantly younger sweet-natured woman who's suffering from a terminal illness(r)

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: Comedy about two very different black men working their way up the corporate ladder. Waymon (Joseph C Phillips) is an Ivy League graduate who is now working his way up the ranks of a major New York company. He befriends Bobby (Tommy Davidson), who works in the company's post room, although the pair have very little in common. When Waymon first notices the stunning Natalie (Halle Berry), he begins to realise that Bobby - who is a friend of hers - could be of some use to him after all

programme.title: Murderous Intent
programme.desc: A murder lifts the lid on some disturbing actions among the pupils at a well-respected school in this drama. Nigel (Tom Sturridge), a student at an exclusive British private school, has been found murdered, and police detective McKenzie (Richard Roxburgh) has been assigned to investigate. Alex Forbes (Eddie Redmayne), one of Nigel's classmates who was known to have little fondness for him, is a prime suspect and has been brought in for questioning; however, he refuses to cooperate, and Sally Rowe (Toni Collette), a forensic psychiatrist working with the police, is brought in to talk to the boy. While Alex is initially no more helpful with Sally, in time she's able to find cracks in his resistance, and he begins to discuss his interest in the Knights Templar, a medieval Christian military order. As Alex shares his belief that the benefits of some actions can outweigh their wrongs, Sally learns more about the boy, and her research turns up some surprising facts – Nigel believed both he and Alex were descended from members of the Knights Templar, they may have been responsible for the death of a schoolmate in the interest of gaining mystical powers, and Alex's father (Patrick Malahide), also the headmaster at the school, has some troubling secrets of his own. Like Minds was the first feature film from writer and director Gregory J. Read

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Acting superstars Denzel Washington and Russell Crowe are captivating in this absorbing crime epic set in the early 1970s. Washington is real-life Harlem drug kingpin Frank Lucas, and Crowe plays Det. Richie Roberts, the N.Y. cop trying to nail him. A top-flight supporting cast is highlighted by Best Supporting Actress nominee Ruby Dee as Lucas's mother. Directed by Ridley Scott, from a script by Steven Zaillian

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Four Oscars, including Best Picture and Best Director, went to Ron Howard's engrossing drama about John Nash, the volatile Nobel Prize-winning mathematician

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas, Teresa, and the rest of the Gladers prepare for phase two of their maze trials after narrowly escaping the first test in this young-adult dystopian sequel

programme.title: Jackie Brown
programme.desc: (1997) Quentin Tarantino's slick and fast-paced third film, based on an Elmore Leonard novel, is a tight thriller centred around blaxploitation star Pam Grier, who plays Jackie Brown, a strong woman approaching the end of her career as an air hostess. She's been trafficking "hot" money for gangster Ordell Robbie (Samuel L Jackson), but when she finds she's carrying enough for retirement she decides to fly solo, so long as she can keep him, the local cops and the feds convinced of her honesty

programme.title: Ballers

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Acting superstars Denzel Washington and Russell Crowe are captivating in this absorbing crime epic set in the early 1970s. Washington is real-life Harlem drug kingpin Frank Lucas, and Crowe plays Det. Richie Roberts, the N.Y. cop trying to nail him. A top-flight supporting cast is highlighted by Best Supporting Actress nominee Ruby Dee as Lucas's mother. Directed by Ridley Scott, from a script by Steven Zaillian

programme.title: Youth
programme.desc: Two longtime friends take stock of their accomplished artistic careers in this meditative drama written and directed by Paolo Sorrentino. Michael Caine stars as Fred Ballinger, a retired composer who, at the behest of his daughter (Rachel Weisz), is on vacation in the Alps with his friend Mick Boyle (Harvey Keitel), a filmmaker currently working on a new project. Fred believes he is enjoying his retirement, but he is soon approached with an offer of a British knighthood if he'll conduct a performance of a famous piece he wrote(n)

programme.title: Magic Mike
programme.desc: Steven Soderbergh's Magic Mike stars Channing Tatum as the title character, an entrepreneur who works as a roofer and in several other occupations, but makes most of his money being the star attraction at Club Xquisite, a male strip joint in Tampa that fills every weekend night with drunken, horny women eager to slide dollar bills between hard-bodied dudes and the G-strings they wear. While on a roofing job, Mike meets Adam (Alex Pettyfer), a misfit college dropout who lost a football scholarship when he punched his coach, and he decides to teach the kid how to become an exotic dancer. Mike introduces Adam to Dallas (Matthew McConaughey), the owner of the club, and gets him onto the crew of regular performers. As Dallas plans a big move for the troupe, Mike tries to start his dream business, falls for Adam's sister, and sees Adam fall to the temptations of the stripper life(n)

programme.title: Greencard Warriors
programme.desc: Left to his own devices after his older brother joins the US military in a bid to gain U.S. citizenship for their family, undocumented 14-year-old Latino immigrant Angel finds his life spiraling into violence after seeking solidarity with a local street gang. Meanwhile, lies emerge that threaten to tear their troubled family apart(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Danish Girl'
programme.desc: A look at "The Danish Girl," a 2015 adaptation of David Ebershoff's novel about early 20th-century Danish painter Einar Wegener, who was one of the first people to have sex-reassignment surgery. The film stars Eddie Redmayne, Alicia Vikander and Matthias Schoenaerts, and is directed by Tom Hooper(n)

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: An international assassin known only as Agent 47 (Timothy Olyphant) carries out high-profile hits for a mysterious organization known only as "The Agency" in this adaptation of the popular Eidos Interactive video-game series. Agent 47 is an elite, genetically engineered assassin who takes great pride in his work. His lethal grace, steady shot, and unparalleled precision have all served to make him one of the most sought-after assassins in the world. But when the killer without a conscience is faced with an unanticipated series of developments, his entire perception of reality begins to shift. On assignment to take out Russian head of state Belicoff (Ulrich Thomsen), Agent 47 is caught off guard by the appearance of presidential look-alikes. When the high-profile hit captures the attention of such powerful intelligence organizations as the CIA and Interpol, agent Mike Whittier (Dougray Scott) is dispatched to rein Agent 47 in. Meanwhile, a mysterious Russian prostitute named Nika (Olga Kurylenko) has walked into Agent 47's life, causing the methodical killer to become overwhelmed by emotions that were previously foreign to him(n)

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: Agent 47 (Rupert Friend), known only by the barcode tattoo on his neck, is an elite international assassin. Engineered to be an unstoppable killing machine, 47 is contracted by a covert organization to assassinate high-profile targets on a global scale. He's given the assignment to kill the leader of a crime syndicate who wishes to unlock the secrets behind 47's powers and harness that information into an army of highly skilled hit men. As 47 races to complete his mission, new information emerges about his origins and sparks a race against time as the agent is hunted for the secrets behind his skills. Aleksander Bach directs this reboot of the 2007 action thriller Hitman(n)
